If you have any additional questions please reach out to us via our in-app 'Chat with us' feature!", 'modified': '2018-04-30T17:42:47Z'}

review: In addition to booking virtual classes at my favorite Pilates studios in the area from one app, I’ve started during the pandemic to book classes around the country, including so far Boston and Hollywood (where one instructor is a wonderful singer-songwriter). I’m looking forward to classes in London and other cities where i can handle the language and time differences. MindBody has used the pandemic’s in-person closures to bring expanded workout experiences into our homes. Good moves!
title: World-wide booking!

review: I’ve been taking more frequent classes than ever at my studio, and initially was looking at the schedule on the studio website, then when I wanted to book a class it would take me to MindBody. Then I realized it was so much more user friendly to just do everything on MindBody. It would always load better, and was easier to navigate, and then I was right where I needed to be to book a class. Thank you MindBody!
title: MindBody so convenient!
developerResponse: {'id': 13493148, 'body': "No, thank you! We really appreciate the review and we're glad to see it's making things easier for you regarding your bookings! ", 'modified': '2020-02-14T15:28:19Z'}

review: I love being able to view the class schedule for all of my favorite places in one view. However, with the new upgrade, I am unable to differentiate between two locations that have the same name. For example, I like too see the schedule for two separate Fusion Fitness locations. Before, it was very clear which class was for which location. Now, they all look the same unless I click on them individually.
title: New upgrade: locations no longer show on Fav Class Schedule View
developerResponse: {'id': 3347687, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback! We're glad you love how easy it is to view the class schedules for your favorite places. We're sorry to learn you're having trouble differentiating between studio locations. Please know that we're aware of this and are looking into a long term solution.", 'modified': '2018-05-03T21:53:14Z'}

review:
Overall this is a good app that makes it much easier for me to schedule and pay for yoga classes.  There are great summaries for each yoga class and teacher and it’s easy to book ahead.  It’s also easy to buy things like a one-off class or class pass.  Love the look and colors and simplicity.

Where they could improve:
- Buggy with my credit card.  More than once I have had to delete the app to do things like update my credit cards expiration date.

- If I buy a class pass at the yoga studio, it doesn’t always sync to the app...which means I can’t book classes through the app.  I try to make sure I buy the class pass through the app...this is annoying.

- The calendar integration doesn’t work.  I try to add a class to my personal iPhone calendar and it fails every time, so I need to manually enter it.
title: Overall Great App, but buggy
developerResponse: {'id': 2683637, 'body': "Thank you for your detailed feedback! We want you to have nothing but smooth sailing with the app and we apologize if you have experienced any troubles. If your passes are not syncing over, we suggest sending the verification email under the Settings section of the app. Keep in mind that there are a few other variables on the business side of things that can cause passes to not sync over. The calendar integration is also located in the same area in the app. You want to make sure your phone's default calendar is the same calendar that is chosen in-app and that you have allowed the app to have access to the calendar under your phone's Settings section. When you have a moment, we would love to ask you a few more questions so we can improve your app. Our Live Chat team would be happy to help. They can be found under the More menu in the app or send us an email via app@mindbodyonline.com. We look forward to helping you!", 'modified': '2018-02-26T18:56:00Z'}

review: I like that I can book online for classes. But I keep getting burned by the same bug. If you click on the classes you’ve signed up for and want to cancel anyone except the first, you click cancel for that class and it always cancels the first one.  I’ve lost my spot in coveted classes multiple times because of it. Grrrr!  If you use the schedule then click on the class it cancels the right one which is annoying as the more direct way SHOULD work correctly.
title: Overall good but one annoying bug

review: Mindbody is a well designed useful application for those seeking beauty, fitness or wellness services. The app makes it easy to search for classes or sessions based on what activities you are interested in whether it be yoga, pilates, spa treatment or any other holistic type of remedies. The app allows you to see if any services are nearby and what the cost is. The interface design is easy to navigate and allows you to favorite classes you are interested in. Mindbody works well as a hub for the fitness activities in your daily life.
title: Mindbody

review: They have the best instructors who naturally design the most effective workouts and understand the balance of pushing you to go to the next step and ensuring you are comfortable and taken care of with great attention to detail in your form. The way they have adapted to the COVID situation has also been impressive and nothing short of remarkable. It’s a testament to their foundational philosophy of consistency and continuing to move to live a healthy life.
title: Amazing gym

review:
When I first got this app a few years back it worked great, but now it doesn’t work at all. I just put in a search for yoga classes in San Francisco tomorrow (Sunday) and the app came back with a message that “no results” were found for yoga classes in San Francisco but that i can try their recommended classes 40 miles away in Morgan Hill.

It’s impossible that there are absolutely no classes in my city on a Sunday. 

I went to settings and it’s seems to be turned on. I’m mystified as to why this app has been virtually unusable in the past 1-2 years
title: Location settings seem off

review:
I don’t understand how the error message of “we looked, but we didn’t find any classes on this day.” is STILL showing up when I try to look at my clubs class schedule -- after uninstalling and reinstalling, after “chats” with the support there is still no resolution it.  I have tried everything multiple times over the past several
months and there has been NO fix and NO FOLLOW UP with the MindBody support.  Please don’t reply to this review with your canned response of “contact us”.  I have!!!  And, nothing has been done to fix this.  I am also not the only member at our club that has this same issue.  Deleting this app for good this time!
title: STILL SHOWS NO CLASSES
developerResponse: {'id': 17297054, 'body': "Hi there, we are sorry you're still experiencing this problem, if you've reached out to us already you'll know we're working hard to fix this issue as it is impacting 1% of iOS users. Again we're sorry you're experiencing this and we're hopeful the developers have a fix for this soon, alternatively you can book via the businesses desktop site, mindbody.io and also call or email, if the business has their own website for booking you also have the option there.\n\nThank you.", 'modified': '2020-08-15T12:53:29Z'}

review: I love being able to sign into my yoga classes and have the ability to quickly cancel out of a class.  It is great to see schedule for months ahead so I make plans and know when I am available for doctor appointments.  I love getting the email reminders and notifications if a class is cancelled due to an instructor getting sick.  It is so great to have this ability at my fingertips.
title: So convenient and easy to use
developerResponse: {'id': 2405281, 'body': 'Thank you for letting us be a part of your wellness routine and for telling us what you love about the MINDBODY App. Your feedback helps us enhance the app with more features that make you happy!', 'modified': '2018-01-25T18:36:01Z'}

review:
UPDATE
App was stable again after deleting and reinstalling. 

I’ve been using the app for a couple years now. Never had a problem until last week when the app started freezing. I would clear the cache on my phone but this never resolved the issue. The app also crashed a couple times. I’m not sure what the developers did in May of 2019 but it’s not working for me. And just for reference I have an iPhone 8 Plus and it’s up to date.
title: What happened??? App is freezing!
developerResponse: {'id': 8688074, 'body': "We are sorry to learn you are experiencing issues with freezing and crashing when using our app. Please reach out to us at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can work to resolve the issues you're experiencing.", 'modified': '2019-05-15T17:05:18Z'}

review:
I like the convenience of being able to reserve classes and pay for them through the app. When I’m traveling, it’s convenient to use the app to find nearby yoga or barre studios and details on the classes offered there. 

They’ve made improvements to the navigation and functionality of the app over the past year or so, which is great! I also like that a lot of spas are now using MindBody too!
title: Great app for booking classes and spa appts!
developerResponse: {'id': 5315105, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We're glad you enjoy the convenience of being able to reserve classes in advance and paying through our app. We appreciate your feedback regarding finding pricing and individual studios. Please reach out to our in-app support for any questions on finding studios, and they will be able to assist you!", 'modified': '2018-10-01T18:22:36Z'}

review: All of my yoga classes are booked through MINDBODY. Unfortunately the app is always crashing or won’t pull up my information for me to book classes. It always says that there are no classes in my area, my schedule is always blank (even when I book classes online on my computer and get confirmations), and it never shows my passes or even lets me chat with customer support. I tried to log out but now when I try to log back in it says “an error has occurred.” I’ve updated the app, uninstalled it, everything. I’ve been having this problem for weeks now. I can use my account on the computer but it never works on the app
title: Frustrating
developerResponse: {'id': 9643164, 'body': 'Hi, I am sorry to hear you have had so much trouble on the app. It sounds like you have a few different issues going on. Go to https://help.mindbody.io/en/ in the lower right corner is the Chat icon. Reach out and we will help you! You can also email is at app@mindbodyonline.com.', 'modified': '2019-07-13T16:05:57Z'}

review: I like to buy 10-class passes and schedule my yoga sessions for the whole month. But because the app does not allow you to purchase a new pass until the existing pass has been used up, I can’t schedule more than 10 sessions ahead. I have to wait until the actual date of the last yoga session purchased with the pass has passed in order to purchase a new pass.
title: Can’t Schedule Weeks Ahead Due to Pass Limitation
developerResponse: {'id': 12202104, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear you've experienced issues in locating a business, we do have a 24/7 live chat team within the app to help you with any issues you may experience. Feel free to drop us a message, anytime and we'll help you out. Thank you.", 'modified': '2019-12-04T08:48:30Z'}

review: This place is heaven. The owner Pam is so welcoming and friendly and warm and comforting! She answers any and all questions you may have, even if you are brand new to the practice. She has created a yoga studio that is authentic, it allows you as a student to see your authenticity and be more aware of how great things can be. Haven Yoga has changed my life and I highly recommend it to everyone.
title: Steppingstone Haven Yoga & Spiritual Sanctuary

review: Location is so 2019! We are now four months into lockdown. I take classes from studios all over the country. But I can’t for example search for a well-reviewed vinyasa class on Friday afternoon without imputing various sample locations. Time to change that as it seems like we aren’t going back to in-person classes soon.
title: Why the requirement for a location in an age of virtual fitness?
developerResponse: {'id': 16864680, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback, we'll certainly pass this over to our developers. ", 'modified': '2020-07-25T13:31:20Z'}

review: This app is aggravating because it constantly removes me from classes that I don’t want to be removed from, if I remove myself from the waitlist for a different class on the same day. I will clearly be on the time I want to cancel and it will remove me from a class I have booked earlier in the day instead. This happens frequently and it’s so frustrating- I wish my Pilates studio used a platform that actually worked to book classes. I’ve also heard from friends this happens to them too, so it seems like a pretty common glitch that should be fixed….
title: Stop removing me from classes I didn’t cancel!

review: This app makes things so easy! I love how I can check my profile and see my scheduled classes. I’m very forgetful, so the “add to calendar” option is also convenient. There was a point in my life where I felt so lost, like I didn’t belong, and The Queer Gym has become my family. I am so grateful for the Coaches and their passion to helping us improve our health, life, and time management!
title: Easy & Organized

review: I love this gym! It has  so many different cardio machines that  make my workout different and challenging each day.  The place is spotless, the staff is friendly and helpful and the clients are a mixed age group with all levels of workout experience.  You don’t feel that “gym” intimidation walking in. I’m a seasonal member and I have to say, I’m going to hate going back to my hometown gym after experiencing Mfit!
title: Great place to workout

review:
Easy to use app that allows you to book almost anywhere, no matter where you are. Thousands of schedules at your fingertips. Especially great when traveling or managing memberships at multiple studios/gyms. 

One issue is sometimes when scrolling through the calendar, it doesn’t update, showing the incorrect schedule for a particular day. Need to exit the app and go back in.
title: Easy AND useful
developerResponse: {'id': 9416273, 'body': 'We are so glad you like the App! When you do have issues remember, we are here for you 24/7. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner.', 'modified': '2019-06-29T16:31:02Z'}

review: The MINDBODY app is really and truly a life changer. The convenience of having all my yoga/fitness clubs schedules easily accessible on one app really has made my life easier. I travel a lot for work so the ability to quickly check out which class I can fit in to my schedule next week, whether I’m in Paris or Philly, not only gives me the information in one place, but makes it more likely that I’ll make it to the class!
title: Absolute Fav App
developerResponse: {'id': 2404839, 'body': 'Thank you for letting us connect you to the wellness world on your travels! This is exactly what we are all about. Woo hoo!', 'modified': '2018-01-25T16:59:15Z'}

review: I love this app, it is convenient and super easy to use. All my classes are right there and I love that it adds to my calendar. I also love that it was asking me how I felt about the classes and Instructors after every class..doesn’t seem to do that anymore which is a bummer but it helps me with other classes getting that personal insight. I think most places should use something like this or this app lol!!! It’s Awesome and I love it!!
title: Love it!!

review: I’ve recently been able to return to Yoga after a years long absence, and Jody has been so welcoming and considerate. Her classes are challenging yet I feel comfortable modifying to my present abilities. Jody checks in with me and all her students after each class and asks how we’re doing and if we have any requests. Jody’s kindness, enthusiasm and friendliness will keep me coming back to her classes.
title: Yoga with Jody

review: I love that it keeps all my fitness stuff in one section, even payments. This has been great throughout the pandemic because I’ve done virtual fitness through the neighborhood I moved away from. Last year it was great because it showed where there was deals to try things. I’ll use that again when the pandemic is over! I wish it kept track of my yearly stuff and didn’t erase it by month.
title: Great app
developerResponse: {'id': 19405898, 'body': "Thank you for your review! You can always see a full breakdown of your history with each studio via their mindbody desktop site or you can speak to our support team and we'll email you a PDF of your visits / purchases. Feel free to reach out to app@mindbodyonline.com thanks! ", 'modified': '2020-11-28T13:44:56Z'}

review:
Really great class! I have been talking it for almost a year. I have seen a big improvement in my flexibility. This is a great class for all levels. Lily is a great teacher and makes the class accessible for all levels.
This is one class that is as good online as in person. The class has remained 90 minutes and is a great practice to do every week to Maintain and improve flexibility and strength.
Thank you Fit & Bendy
title: Intro to contortion
developerResponse: {'id': 17157335, 'body': 'Hi there, be sure to rate the business within your Schedule > History so they get to see this lovely review too!', 'modified': '2020-08-08T13:17:40Z'}

review: I’ve been a member for about 3 months now, and I am starting to see a difference in my workouts. I feel stronger, and I can do the exercises longer. The staff members are amazing. They really coach you throughout the entire workout. They motivate you so you don’t want to quit, even when your body does. The facility is super clean! It feels nice to walk into a gym that smells good, is neat, and in order. It’s truly a 5 star gym. I love Project Body Atl! Great job team!
title: Great workout!
developerResponse: {'id': 9359175, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback. I'm sure the business would love to hear this, if you go into your History within the app and from there you can review the class and this review will be sent directly to the business. Thanks again!", 'modified': '2019-06-26T08:58:34Z'}

review:
App needs to be restarted randomly after you add a class to your schedule.  It seems to be an issue where the software doesn’t know to refresh the UI.  You’ll select a new day to book a class and the page will not update to the new day.  Restating the app is the only way to get past this.

The calendar syncing appears to give up after a few weeks.  Simply going into the settings makes it remember to add your classes to your calendar.  You don’t even need to change anything in the calendar sync page.  Just simply going there corrects it.
title: Old app was better for 2 reasons
developerResponse: {'id': 8577057, 'body': 'We are sorry to learn you are experiencing issues with the app freezing after booking a class. Please reach out to us at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can help fix these issues for you!', 'modified': '2019-05-08T17:14:32Z'}

review: Amanda and Bo are both amazing athletes, it’s quite an honor to be taught by the best. I was completely new to functional fitness before my first class and they are so kind and patient. But best of all they really work with you until you truly understand how to do the workouts properly, I definitely needed that extra help..lol So if you’re a beginner or a very experienced athlete you’re in great hands!
title: The best!!

review: As a working single mom I felt completely nurtured by the flexible and understanding management. The always warm and personable staff listened to all my desires, limited time, financial yada… and remembered my life details two months later at my next appointment. That’s just not found most places.  My results are extremely exciting and I’m sure going to keep going back to Renew!
title: I’m Impressive and I’m Improved

review:
At least on three occasions it has signed me up for a different class than selected. Either same time but AM vs PM or different day at the same time. It's frustrating bc I usually have to call the studio to see if they can switch it. Would be nice to have a confirmation screen with the class time and date before booking - not just if you are sure you want to book. 

Otherwise I enjoy the flexibility of connecting to multiple studios without many different logins.
title: Has some bugs but otherwise useful
developerResponse: {'id': 3944054, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback. We're sorry to learn you're having trouble booking the right class and want to help. Please reach out to us via our in-app chat so our team can look into this for you.", 'modified': '2018-06-22T18:27:41Z'}

review:
I’ve had this app for a while, and am delighted with how well it captures the varied classes my family uses. It has even captured classes and class passes from two different states.

I particularly like the in-app support, which was able to assist me so quickly that we’d sorted out an issue with my class punchcard in the time it took me to walk from my car to the yoga studio. It’s the easiest way for me to sign up for yoga, parkour, massage, and my kids’ lessons.
title: Works across states and types of class!
developerResponse: {'id': 3107087, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback! We’re so glad you’re able to search for and find a wide variety of classes you love no matter where you are, share experiences with your family, and that you’ve been able to use our stellar in-app support team!', 'modified': '2018-04-11T22:40:28Z'}

review:
This could be my most used app on my phone. Book spin and yoga here. Can rate my class with the reminders that MINDBODY sends minutes after. 
Easy to find Specials and Deals. Love the way it’s so easy to add my selected class to my calendar or share it with a friend to invite to join me on that date. 
Great to have such a functional , reliable, and resourceful app !  Now you get after it !
title: Super App ! Use it daily to book spin and yoga
developerResponse: {'id': 2525128, 'body': "Thank you for your rad feedback! We think you are super too and are happy to hear you are using the features that make the MINDBODY App so uniquely awesome. We will never stop gettin' after the world of wellness!", 'modified': '2018-02-07T17:50:56Z'}

review:
I really love the search options for studios in any particular location and have used it to help others find classes in their areas.

The orange color is great - easy to spot on my cluttered screen.  Those who don’t like it might want to turn down the brightness on their screen.  Or, in a future issue, you may want to consider allowing users to choose their own color scheme.

I like to schedule classes a week in advance, and it’s a little clunky in that regard...but still way better than not having the app at all.  

Also, I have a problem scheduling a week ahead on the app if the days cross over into the next month, which are not paid for yet by the studio’s automatic draw on my account.  A bit of a nuisance.

Overall, a useful app!   Thank you for developing it.
title: Easy to use
developerResponse: {'id': 3107121, 'body': 'Thanks for your detailed feedback. We take all customer input seriously as we work to constantly improve our in-app experience. Unfortunately we have no way to control individual studio’s billing schedules as that’s up to each studio to decide, but we’re sorry to hear scheduling a week ahead can be a pain sometimes. If you have any additional suggestions please don’t hesitate to reach out to our consumer support team via the in-app “Chat with us” feature.', 'modified': '2018-04-11T22:45:54Z'}

review: I love the mind body app and have recently switched over to using this app for gyms instead of ZenPlanner. The only thing I wish for is being able to see what other people are signed up for the classes. It was a feature on zen planner that helped me remember who people were that I had met in the gym and connect with them next class without awkwardly asking their name again lol. Outside of that the app is 5/5.
title: Love the app!

review: Up completely crashes every time I try to select a class and hit the next button to pay. I tried do use the desktop version on a Mac, but with the voiceover screen reader it was impossible. HTML elements like headings and links or poorly used to guide navigation, and when trying to select the class it told me it was bringing up a modal, but it was just a giant page of information, not even organized into a table.
title: Crash is at confirmation

review: I downloaded this app and attempted to create an account, but I received endless error messages. It’s slow to load and quite literally doesn’t function at even the most fundamental level. I deleted the app and reinstalled and got exactly the same result. I then randomly received an email from MindBody asking me to confirm my email address (even though the app had error messages had said it couldn’t create an account right now), and the verification link also took me to a broken webpage on MindBody’s website. Utter waste of time all around.
title: App Literally Doesn’t Work

review: Thankfully I don’t have to pay to use this. It doesn’t even work. The main page never fully loads no matter how long you wait (max time I waited was 15 minutes with auto lock on my phone turned off). Whenever you click on anything at all the app freezes or loads a blank screen. If I want to sign up for any classes that unfortunately use this god forsaken abandoned app, I have to go to the difficult to navigate webpage or constantly ask my teachers/coaches to sign me up. I don’t know whats going on with this app, but the developers or whomever need to get it together. It didn’t use to be this way.
title: Literally Worst App Ever
developerResponse: {'id': 9406656, 'body': 'Hi there! I am so sorry to hear you are experiencing so much freezing and the long lag times. Please reach out to us via chat. since the app is not loading the main page, you can chat with us from this link - https://help.mindbody.io/ There will be a chat circle in the lower right corner. We can assist you 24/7.', 'modified': '2019-06-28T17:32:37Z'}

review:
The Camp is a great place! 
The energy that the trainers bring pumps you up and turns on a switch. The staff are welcoming and helpful🥰. Love working out with other members new challengers all different ages. We all have our own challenge we work out on our own pace. The trainers are correcting our form and making us believe in us. Try out the Camp you won’t regret it!
title: Leg Day🔥 with Alex TC

review: I wanted to sign up both of my kids for a hitting session at a local business. It said to download the app. I did that register and all that. But you can not sign up for more then one session. I sent a message and was told that I would have to make account for each of my kids. One one wants to set up several different accounts and have to log in and out of them to schedule a hitting class. And why would MINDBODY want kids to have an account. It doesn’t really make sense. 3 kids I would need 3 accounts ?????? The point of the app is to make it easier to sign up for classes. Doesn’t seem easier at all.
title: Not User Friendly
developerResponse: {'id': 8465055, 'body': 'Thanks for your feedback. While we don’t have the ability to book appointments for more than one person we will be adding this functionality in the near future, so stay tuned!', 'modified': '2019-05-01T18:39:41Z'}

review:
You get three stars for laziness or a purposeful attempt to hide data. 

This app does what you need it to do. Book a session. No issues there. 

But. I want to be able to read the reviews of an individual instructor. I can’t do that. The app show an instructor with four stars filled and the fifth star partially filled yet won’t let me isolate that instructor from the others at the same studio or let me filter reviews in any way. It just wants to show five star reviews. It’s a simple SELECT statement developers.
title: Good app but studio reviews needs work

review: If I could give them 0 stars I would. We were forced to shut our business down completely and we’re trying to avoid bankruptcy. I called Mindbody to cancel my account and they were quick to point out that they’ll keep my account open for 30 days and bill me for it. I explained my situation and told them I couldn’t afford another 30 days. They didn’t care.
title: Heartless
developerResponse: {'id': 15592626, 'body': "We're really sorry to hear about your experience, please feel free to reach out to the support team again regarding cancellation notice if you still require advice or support on the matter.", 'modified': '2020-05-27T07:51:46Z'}

review: As I wait on hold for over an hour I gave this review a shot. I would not recommend mindbody as a studio owner. The software for customers is not user friendly and as an owner as well. Biggest issure, is that it has limited me from making money for sure.  Offering easy signups for memberships is difficult and offering different price values for classes, workshops and events is even more difficult. I spend a large amount of my time helping my customers use mindbody and finding ways around booking classes. I picked my mindbody becuase it was all i knew, big regret
title: Not helpful to studio owner

review:
Yoga Reclaimed welcomes all - if you are looking for a Yoga Studio to continue practicing Yoga or are new to Yoga. 
Ryan and Jamie Bailey offer several classes including Mysore Ashtanga, Restorative Yin, and Vinyasa Flow. Some of the benefits may be learning about what muscle groups are involved in the pose, correct breathing, and dristhi (where to place your gaze). No matter what you learn…get refreshed, mindful and and experience a better version of life and yourself.
title: Yoga Reclaimed

review: Mind body is my go to app when I’m home and away!  I use it to book classes at my favorite studios at home.  It allows me to schedule in  exercise into my busy day, by easily setting aside the clock of time and automatically addition in to my calendar.  When I travel, I almost always look at specials at yoga studios nearby and it’s allowed me to sample different classes, teachers!  Thanks, mind body!
title: A favorite app!
developerResponse: {'id': 8118825, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback! We are so glad you love using the app to book classes at home and while traveling! We hope you continue to use it in the future!', 'modified': '2019-04-08T18:28:10Z'}

review:
Can’t change email. Instructions say you can change email address through the business you signed up with, but the app still associates with old email address. Deleting and re-downloading app (at least with iOS), didn’t solve the problem. 

Other problems in the past included inability to receive member discount when registering for workshops and similar payment difficulties. Can’t access video classes through the app but have to go thru website.
title: Clunky

review:
Have to delete and add the app every time I want to use, because schedules in general and for my Favorite business do not show up.  Classes I signed up for do not appear as well.   Not solution provided yet and gave no indication if/when a solution would be provided.  Was told the best solution for now is to delete and add the app every time I want to use.

Further, every time I call up Data Preferences, the app closes which leads me to believe that I have no control over what happens to my data.  If that’s the case, that’s unacceptable.

I reported the first item about two months ago and have yet to hear back from anyone.
title: Zero stars
developerResponse: {'id': 17015108, 'body': "HI there, this is a temporary solution until we get a permanent resolution but in terms of your favorites and schedule missing this is more than likely down to a sync issue. Could you email our support team at app@mindbodyonline.com so they can look further into this for you as this isn't a known issue.", 'modified': '2020-08-01T07:53:52Z'}

review: My friend sent me a link to a dance class to register. I have a Mind Body account, but was only offered the option to sign up or check out as a guest. In the end I created a new account because it was faster than figuring out how to log in. The UX of the app was very clunky, requiring me to confirm the same step multiple times, and to go through multiple apparently needless screens before allowing me to book. The more clicks to conversion, the more customers you lose. Very counterintuitive process to register for a class through an app.
title: Poor user experience
developerResponse: {'id': 9831047, 'body': 'Hi there, I am sorry you had such a difficult experience. Thank you for the feedback. We will use it to continue to evolve and improve the app.  You can always reach out to our support team. They will be able to assist you with any app issues you have. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner. ', 'modified': '2019-07-24T18:21:28Z'}

review: Seems like a great app so far. I do think the legibility/ visibility is a little low. The user experience is a little tough visually in terms of font size and contrast. Also it would be smart to populate your most recent place at the top of your favorites. I always think it’s not there but I need to scroll down and don’t realize it. But I think the studios love it it’s just a little pricey for them.
title: Not following accessibility guidelines but a solid and very useful app for me.
developerResponse: {'id': 9288450, 'body': 'Thank you for the feedback! We appreciate your candor and glad you think the app is great! Remember we have 24/7 Chat support in the app when you have any issues or questions. 😀', 'modified': '2019-06-21T14:27:20Z'}

review:
Novo classes are the best! The instructors are fun, energetic, & amazing! The classes are so good! I finally found my groove!  Classes designed to work every muscle group, tailored to women, you will get toned and more healthy in no time if you push yourself, and stick with the classes each week!
Heated yoga and trampoline classes are a couple of my favorites! So thankful for this awesome workout studio of genuine wonderful ladies!
title: Novo classes!

review: It has been quite awhile since I practiced yoga and never on a consistent level. Since joining Beacon Yoga just a month ago I definitely feel and see a difference in my body tone. You work at your own level the Yogi’s are all wonderful in their own ways and I look forward to my next class I only wish my work schedule allowed me to practice more each week!
title: Beacon yoga
developerResponse: {'id': 13290532, 'body': 'Thanks for the amazing feedback, we really appreciate it! Be sure to leave the business a review via your History so they get to see this too! ', 'modified': '2020-02-04T15:02:23Z'}

review: For some reason the app won’t put my workout events on the system calendar even though the setting has been enabled for years and never touched. Recent version also re-adjusted the default calendar by no interaction from the end-user at all. Workouts are scheduled but later when checking the calendar, they’re conspicuously absent until I reopen Mindbody. Not preferred, almost missed a class but knew something was wrong.
title: Frustrated with calendar syncing and disappearing workouts
developerResponse: {'id': 17297034, 'body': 'Hi there, please reach out to our support team at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can assist you with this, thank you!', 'modified': '2020-08-15T12:50:12Z'}

review:
Best things about this app:

1. Signs into my class for me by using my GPS to know I’m at the location.

2. Connects to my Fitbit and figures out the amount of calories I burned SPECIFICALLY IN THAT CLASS. 

I didn’t even know either of these technologies existed until now!!!

Also, I read past reviews and the developers of this app are EXTREMELY responsive to market desires. It’s amazing how features people were asking for less than a year ago have already been implemented! This company has amazing employees :)

The App Store should allow for outdated low-ratings requesting updates, that have now been implemented, to be deleted because these old ratings are making its score inaccurate for the app it is today.
title: Awesome Technology
developerResponse: {'id': 7718344, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your detailed feedback. We're glad you love our app and especially enjoy the technology of it and continue using it in the future!", 'modified': '2019-03-13T20:15:45Z'}

review: I was in Austin Texas over the weekend and did my normal bookings for swim lanes last week. I chose 2:30 while I was in the Central time zone. Everything appeared normal until I checked this morning now that I’m back in the Pacific time zone. What actually got booked was 12:30 Pacific (2:30 Central). The app should always book in the time zone of the gym, not the user’s location.
title: Booking reservations from another time zone

review:
I like this app for booking classes, but I will say whoever comes up with the “notifications” needs to read the room. 

My phone screen lit up with the message “Don’t sweat the cost; save that for your workout!” Given the financial situation many people are currently experiencing due to shut downs, I found that to be really tacky, even though it didn’t apply to me.
title: Usually fine, but read the room

review: I really enjoy using this app and find it MUCH more user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing than the website. My only issues with it are it seems not to integrate with Apple’s standard health app and it doesn’t connect to the Lose It all, which I’ve been using for a few months. The former issue is probably user error on my end, but the latter isn’t. All in all, though, I love it!
title: Love the App. Wish it connected to other health apps better.
developerResponse: {'id': 10059082, 'body': 'Thank for the feedback and suggestions! We are hoping for more integrations in the future. Cheers to booking your best year\r yet.', 'modified': '2019-08-07T19:06:19Z'}

review: I have been using this app for years with success, until about a month ago. Something happened and now it is broken. If I’m lucky enough to get it to load I can book one class, maybe two and then it crashes and freezes. After that, the app is usable for hours. I do not know what has happened, but a perfectly good app is now utterly worthless. Not sure why something that wasn’t broken was fixed, but now it is definitely broken. I am deleting this app and will not be using it anymore, which is a shame because it was perfect for scheduling exercise classes before.
title: Broken
developerResponse: {'id': 9012797, 'body': 'We apologize for the issues you are experiencing with loading times and are working on a fix. Please stay tuned for an update to the app that will address the issues you are currently experiencing!', 'modified': '2019-06-04T19:34:45Z'}

review: I love the convenience of this app and was very happy when I was finally able to choose my own correct pass to use when booking a class. But it still is not working. It lets me choose which pass to use but then uses a different than what I chose. I am constantly canceling and booking classes trying to outsmart the app. So in the end I have to ask the studio to fix it for me. Frustrating when it seems like it should be so easy to figure out?!
title: Not choosing the correct pass!
developerResponse: {'id': 7215706, 'body': 'We apologize for the issues you are experiencing with loading the correct passes and are currently working on a fix for this. If you have any additional questions or feedback please reach out to us in our in-app chat so we can further assist you.', 'modified': '2019-02-09T01:25:51Z'}

review: Absolutely loving it here ! I have been so excited to come in to my workouts, which I never am pumped to workout. Everyday is something different so you never know what your walking into which I LOVE. The personalization and push is UNREAL. The amount of encouragement from Miranda and Jordan is great! I finally feel great getting back into the grind of working out and am supper happy to call limitless my workout place !!!!
title: Love it🔥
developerResponse: {'id': 11838720, 'body': "Hi there! Thanks for your detailed review, be sure to leave one for the business you're referring to by going to your Class History and submitting it from there so they get to see this awesome feedback too! ", 'modified': '2019-11-14T08:11:37Z'}

review: The app is convenient for viewing studio schedules and booking classes. However it’d be great if you could add a select favorite or two for the home screen, like in a previous version. When you have many favorites saved and your most used studio starts with an S, it’d be way more convenient to not have to scroll through a bunch of others to get to your studio at the bottom that you use on the regular.
title: Add Home Screen Favorite!
developerResponse: {'id': 6888995, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback! If you press down on a studio on the Favorites tab, then you can reorganize your favorites that way. We will also be updating the favorites screen to make it easier to reorganize your favorites and set a home favorite going forward — stay tuned!', 'modified': '2019-01-17T17:54:33Z'}

review:
This is a great app to have for the health conscious community! It makes it easy to check class schedules and book/ cancel appointments, compare venues, and review bodyworkers all within one app in minutes! The Business Mind Body App is also wonderful for teachers and practitioners, making scheduling/ canceling appointments, updating your availability with ease, as well as raising awareness of you as a bodyworker! :) 
Many thanks! :)
title: Wonderful App!
developerResponse: {'id': 8176836, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to share a review! We are so glad you love using our app to book classes, check schedules and compare venues! We hope you continue to use it in the future!', 'modified': '2019-04-11T19:00:21Z'}

review:
I love the conveniency of this app! 
From yoga, cycling, cardio this app has access to it all. 
It’s nice to sign into one place and have access to all of the studios instead of making an account for each one. 
The app allows you to purchase packages/classes easily and gives you the option to add it to your calendar with their address so when it comes to the day you’re good to go!
title: Convenient
developerResponse: {'id': 3107103, 'body': 'Thanks for your awesome feedback! We agree that one of the greatest things about our app is its ability to pull everything you love from workouts to wellness to beauty all in one place. We love our calendar syncing abilities as well - hope you continue to use and love our app!', 'modified': '2018-04-11T22:43:52Z'}

review: I hate this app I cannot link to the Camp transformation Center in Lancaster California I just signed up for a 12 your contact with him I was already doing a one month and the sink on here took almost 4 weeks to get up to speed I only have a few of my workouts logged and now I cannot even find Camp transformation in Lancaster California
title: I hate this app
developerResponse: {'id': 17157220, 'body': 'Hi there, if you require support, please reach out to the support team for help syncing your app account to the online profile the business has on file for you. You can reach them at app@mindbodyonline.com Thank you', 'modified': '2020-08-08T13:03:01Z'}

review: I've been trying to leave a review for my Piltes instructor all say and I keep getting a pop up error stating "oops try submitting your review in a few minutes." But it still does not work after a few minutes and I've tried all day. I'm not over the character limit. I am not using any emojis or special punctuation and it still will not accept my review. Someone please fix this or advise if I'm doing something wrong.
title: Review Function Is Not Working

review:
I’ve been following a lot more small business fitness healthcare providers since the pandemic started, and with that I’ve been hearing more and more stories about the poor customer service they experience. 

I’ve never been fond of the app, other versions have been glitchy and the interface isn’t always the easiest to use. It’s often easier to call the location as antiquated as that feels.

But right now especially I’d expect more care to go into taking care of the very human people who make your app successful by paying to have their businesses listed on your service.
title: Not for me
developerResponse: {'id': 19558103, 'body': 'Sorry to hear about your experience. Feel free to reach out to app@mindbodyonline.com to discuss any feature requests you may have, thank you.', 'modified': '2020-12-05T13:28:39Z'}

review: I like the app. I like I can sign up for a class and it’s synced to my calendar.  It would be nice to be able to export classes attended for a certain period of time.  Like export the previous months classes to show what I’ve done. This would also help if someone needs verification for reimbursement through an employer.  :)
title: Is there a way to export?

review: Remember the days when we had to call and schedule a class or just show up and hope for a spot? Now,3-4 micro second clicks, from almost anywhere on the planet, and I am on the schedule. What a gift! Your new setup is colorful, fun, and nicely designed. Always looking forward to what is next from this company.
title: Access.

review: I really love this app, it lets me view near by gym/yoga studio schedules and book one off classes as it fits my schedule. It also links with my profile at my regular studio so I can book classes with class cards or passes. I also love the last minute deal function. I’ve only ever used the fitness portion of it so I can’t speak to the other functions.
title: Great app for booking one off classes
developerResponse: {'id': 9930364, 'body': 'Hi there, thanks for the review! We are glad you are loving the app, we kinda love it too.', 'modified': '2019-07-31T01:48:25Z'}

review: This app is so great to keep track of all my yoga appointments. I can cancel very easy if my schedule changes I could review my history on what I took before and I could look at what I have planned. If you enjoy your yoga class you can even write a review which is really nice so they know what you like and don’t like.
title: Great app to keep track

review: It is apparently this app’s policy to allow all notifications to be managed by individual businesses — even those relating to purchases and charges to your class account. I signed up for a waitlist class, was never notified that I had been moved into the class, or that I would be charged for the class if I tried to cancel once moved off the waitlist. Even if app notifications are turned off, you should be notified if you are charged for a class — as is the policy of other apps and websites. Extremely disappointing cop out by MindBody and sloppy policy making.
title: Poor Functionality Resulting in Unfair Charges
developerResponse: {'id': 4638220, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We're sorry to learn you had a negative experience using the waitlist functionality in our app. Please reach out to us via our in-app chat so we can work with you and the studio to resolve this.", 'modified': '2018-08-14T01:37:10Z'}

review: There is a lot to like about the app. But twice now I have showed up for a class that I thought was Saturday but was really Sunday. If there is no class Saturday, it automatically bumps you to Sunday without you realizing it. And the all calls both days by the letter S so it is very difficult to distinguish. I have run into other people that have made the same mistake and showed up to a class that doesn’t exist
title: Glitch that is very annoying

review: Love this app, put it on my iPad. Not sure if it's not iPad compatible but the app logo goes white after install after restarting and deleting and re downloading it's still like that. App opens and works fine though it's just aesthetic. Only really an issue because the app is pretty and my iPad apps are rainbow organized hah. Still, developer note!
title: Icon disappears after install on iPad
developerResponse: {'id': 2285566, 'body': 'We love that you love the MINDBODY App! You are right, the app is not currently formatted for the iPad which is why the icon is blank. Perhaps the app can be the cloud supporting your iPad rainbow?', 'modified': '2018-01-12T17:50:44Z'}

review: Honestly the worst company I have ever dealt with in my life. As a small business owner this company has done nothing but disrupt business. The app hardly ever works. The prices are wrong, they get the dates wrong, and it crashes the website constantly. As a small business owner the software is extremely expensive, the customer service below average where most of the time you end up fixing the problem yourself or teaching the customer service person how to do their job. The worst. Company. Ever.
title: You will need a support group after dealing with MINDBODY

review:
This app has been simple and easy to use so far. Also, everything looks really clean. One issue I have is with reading the reviews of the classes. I wish you could tap the, for example, “49 reviews 4 stars” and the app redirects you to the reviews which you can read similar to the way the app store works. Anyway, that’s my only complaint. Otherwise I would give 5 stars. 

Good job, Mindbody developers!
title: 4 Stars for now

review:
I really loved this app, until the “updated” design now makes it harder on the eyes to find anything, especially the classes list schedule. Also the class history is harder to read too. It’s used to look more like a calendar view and it was easier to review dates attended and so on. 

In general now there is so much white space and such a small font. It is just so hard to read on mobile devices. 

Functionality rocks but UI will keep me away. Please go back!
title: UI Downgrade?
developerResponse: {'id': 3386516, 'body': 'Thanks for leaving a review. We tried our hardest to create an update that would help make finding and booking classes easier. Please know we are looking into the issues with font sizes and hope to resolve this in a future update. There is no way to revert back to the old version, but we do hope you continue to explore the benefits of the update!', 'modified': '2018-05-07T20:08:16Z'}

review: So easy to add classes to your schedule. Also allows you to set up reminders so you don’t forget which makes having a busy life so much easier!!! Tracks your classes and even shows you deals for classes your interested in that are near by. If you’re committed to a studio or just wanna try stuff out, I recommend getting this app!!!
title: Easy to use
developerResponse: {'id': 10657499, 'body': 'Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!', 'modified': '2019-09-12T23:46:25Z'}

review: I’ve used this app for the past couple of years to search for and schedule yoga classes. I’ve found the MINDBODY App to be convenient and often times easier to navigate than yoga studios’ websites... I haven’t had any problems. This app helps me stay dedicated to my wellness and finding yoga studios when moving around frequently.
title: Easy to find and schedule classes
developerResponse: {'id': 6014691, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback! We're thrilled you've been using our app for years and find it very convenient and helps you stay dedicated to wellness. We hope you continue using it in the future as well!", 'modified': '2018-11-19T21:37:17Z'}

review: Great app- there isn’t anything like it really- great chat feature when you need customer service. Easy booking for classes and when I did have an issue it was cleared up right away by Heather in customer service . She fixed it right away with fast answers and professional help. Love it- super next level. I will continue to use -
title: Chat feature is awesome
developerResponse: {'id': 2275919, 'body': 'You are awesome! Thank you for sharing your rock star experience. Next level customer service is what we aim for!', 'modified': '2018-01-11T20:51:08Z'}

review: It had been decades since I had joined an exercise class. I went to one class at the Dundee location and I was hooked! The instructors were so welcoming. They are very knowledgeable and good at redirecting your movements that give your body the most benefit. If you’ve never tried this type of exercise class, I highly recommend you do it and reward yourself!
title: Reward yourself!
developerResponse: {'id': 10563499, 'body': "We're so happy to see you're enjoying booking at businesses through our app. Be sure to leave the business a review so they get to see this too. Go to your class history and select 'Write a Review' I'm sure they'll be pleased to see your feedback!", 'modified': '2019-09-07T09:41:54Z'}

review: He has changed my life. The variety is services is what is most attractive. He’s been my trainer for the last 6 weeks. Prior to this, he was my masseuse. His training style is unmatched. Now that the new space is open, I get to meet his other clients during training sessions. It’s the most fun I’ve had exercising in a long time!
title: David is amaze balls

review: I was hesitant to join because I hadn’t worked out in about 3 years and because of the price. Still, I signed a one year contract promised myself that I’d attend at least three times a week. Well, two weeks in and I’ve gone 5 days a week. The workouts are AMAZING! Perla is so motivating and encouraging.  Highly recommend this bootcamp.
title: Amazing

review: I have never enjoyed exercising and have tried various types and ways to get more active. Barre classes at The Cornerstone Fitness is by far one I thoroughly enjoy. Every instructor is knowledgeable, interactive, and very personable. Each 50 minute class goes by in a “flash”. I feel guilty when I can’t make a class every day.
title: The Cornerstone Fitness

review:
I pop in and out of this app everyday. Since the last update it’s been very cumbersome to log in. It requires 5 steps/taps & two facial recognition... more than my bank! EVERY time it asks if I want to turn on facial recognition, EVERYtime. 

Once I’m in it’s great but I’m annoyed with MindBody now every time I use it!!
title: Annoying since upgrade
developerResponse: {'id': 17015250, 'body': 'Hi there, we did receive reports regarding 7.1.0 force logging users out when closing out of the app. Our developers have released a fix for this 7.1.2 however please when updating to 7.1.2, uninstall the app and manually reinstall it or it may continue to still happen due to the tokens not refreshing. Thank you for your patience whilst we got this resolved!\r\n', 'modified': '2020-08-01T08:08:18Z'}

review: Omg this app has so many glitches it makes me want to pull my hair out. I would choose ANY alternative to sign up at my preferred studio over “mind body” if I had that option. I would say 10% of the time the app properly loads my available passes and studio schedules. The other 90% the app says I have no passes available (I do) and says the business I’m choosing have no current schedule (they do). It’s SUPER frustrating. Turning my phone off and on doesn’t improve the app faults. Deleting and re downloading the app doesn’t work either. It’s just a super sucky app.
title: Glitches glitches glitches
developerResponse: {'id': 9634050, 'body': 'Hi WisergrlMD, I am sorry to hear you are having so much trouble with the app. It sounds like you have some sync issues. Please reach out to our support team. We are here to help you! You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner.', 'modified': '2019-07-12T14:51:05Z'}

review:
We used to be able to tell which day on a schedule we were looking at.  That day stayed highlighted.  Since the last update… that is no longer the case.  I can click a future date on a studio’s schedule but there is no indication which day I’m looking at.  

Please change this back to the way it was.
title: Latest update is worse

review:
The app is fantastic to use (booking and canceling and seeing at a glance my schedule etc) but I wasn’t being able to use paid passes at one of my yoga places 
An email to support had replies very soon and an intelligent man Michael figured out what was wrong and fixed it, all in a couple of hours from my contacting them. 
Could not be happier!
title: Great customer service
developerResponse: {'id': 3477379, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to share a rating! We're glad you love how easy it is to book and manage classes in our app. We're so happy our support team was able to assist you in getting your yoga pass added to your account. We hope you continue to use our app and explore the new features!", 'modified': '2018-05-15T17:57:32Z'}

review: I use classpass and find their app very easy to navigate. I thought it’d be good to use mind body to find deals on classes after I run out of classpass credits. However there’s no option to filter by price, or filter by free classes. There’s only the option to filter what classes have “flexible pricing.” Also the search function functionality doesn’t work. I typed in a studio that I know used mind body and I’ve seen it on mind body before, but it says there are no results based on my preferences. I feel like this app is missing some pretty basic functionality.
title: Difficult to use
developerResponse: {'id': 7459287, 'body': "We apologize for the issues you are experiencing finding the studios you love and want to help! Please reach out to us in our in-app chat so we can help you find what you're looking for.", 'modified': '2019-02-25T19:24:45Z'}

review: I loved the app prior to this update, I tried several yoga studios in my area and when we traveled I found all kinds of places near us to try too. But with the new update, nope. I can still view schedules for places I had already bookmarked but that’s literally all I can do. If I go to explore it will return absolutely no results no matter what you do. So if I wanted to try something new right now, can’t. I HATE this update. The only positive things I can say about this version are that I can still book at my favorite studio and that it is very pretty. Pretty, but non functional. Bummer.
title: Update not so good...
developerResponse: {'id': 3915996, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We're sorry to learn you're having trouble finding new studios. We are currently working on improving our search functionality — please stay tuned for future updates to our search that will make finding new classes and studios even easier!", 'modified': '2018-06-20T21:01:45Z'}

review: I have been using this app for years and I really love it! I am able to find and register for or cancel a class in no time at all. More recent updates have made it much easier to navigate and access schedules, among other things. There are occasional glitches... but they’re rare and fixed very quickly. Thanks for everything! Namaste 🙏🏻☀️
title: Great App!
developerResponse: {'id': 3331599, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to share a rating. We're glad you love our app and have been using it for years. We're thrilled you find the new update more straightforward to navigate and access your schedule among other things. We hope you'll continue to explore the new features!", 'modified': '2018-05-02T16:08:06Z'}

review: Mind & body is so easy to use !! I bring up my gym that I work out in pick a day check out the schedule see what classes  I want to take &  booked it I hit add to the calendar it gets added to the calendar. The app is simple and easy to use. I hope they never change a thing.
title: Booking a class

review: I travel seasonally and therefore need to start and stop memberships. Mindbody does not provide for membership management in-app (except to purchase memberships, of course) so you need to log in via browser. This is so convoluted that the gyms I am a member at have tutorials for how to do it in their FAQs. Not letting people easily cancel is a deceptive and onerous sales practice. Don’t be like Comcast—make our lives easier. It just leads to more disputed transactions and angry customers, not (legitimately) higher sales figures.
title: Cannot cancel in-app

review: I love how this app lets me register for crowded classes and be sure of a spot.  The app is easy to use, and apparently responsive to changes, as my gym shows changes in instructor for specific classes.  The flaw is that the app lacks a dark mode for the iOS version.  I often go into the app very late at night using an iPad.  That blast of white screen is jolting.
title: Excellent app with one flaw

review:
Since the latest update I am not able to use the app without extreme difficulty. It constantly crashes, is extremely slow, gets stuck, doesn’t load and I can’t book classes. 
I have been using the app for many years and until now, had no problems but this update has made the app unusable. 
Please fix!
This problem has been going on for several weeks now. Even after several updates to supposedly fix the problems, it actually got worse. I can’t do ANYTHING at all when I open the app.
title: Major problems with latest update
developerResponse: {'id': 8688077, 'body': "We are sorry to learn you have experienced issues with our app since the last update. Please reach out to us at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can address the issues you're experiencing.", 'modified': '2019-05-15T17:05:47Z'}

review: I enjoy using the app to book my hot yoga classes. I can see the accurate dates, times, descriptions, and even updates of a class is cancelled. Also great way to keep a history of when you went to class. Wish availability of discounts were available but you can always call the studio.
title: Convenient way to book
developerResponse: {'id': 10559057, 'body': 'We are so glad you are enjoying the app! We are always updating and adding new features and options. ', 'modified': '2019-09-06T19:52:13Z'}

review: This app is seriously lacking in quality. It gives me a fair amount of headache. 2 days ago I could add clients to my schedule but could not erase anyone. This resulted in me having to write myself emails about the changes I needed to have made so that I could fix them when the app was working again. Yesterday the app worked perfectly. Today I cannot erase anything again. Sometimes it gives me double ‘unavailable’ status for no reason. Yes, app is up to date, that’s not the problem. It’s just a bad app.
title: Crappy App
developerResponse: {'id': 5567598, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback about the MINDBODY Business App. We're sorry to learn you're having issues using our business app — please reach out to your customer support specialist so they can help you out with this!", 'modified': '2018-10-19T01:40:51Z'}

review: I’m not sure where the four-point nine rating comes from. The most recent reviews are not good. I worked in  telecommunications for many years and this is not a user friendly app. Once I got into my specific gym, it did not list all the classes. After several minutes of back-and-forth and clicking drop downs, I gave up. The next time I went to the gym I just signed up for classes there. Much easier to go or call the facility.
title: Not user-friendly

review: The app serves its purpose and works most of the time. There are quite a few times it hasn’t picked up my workout so I don’t get credit on the tracker (which I’ve submitted tickets for). Support/IT on the other hand is trash. I’ve opened 3+ cases. They either go untouched for months, or they come back saying there was an error with my case being submitted and they didn’t receive it. Never actually received thoughtful feedback on any support case I’ve opened.
title: App is good, Support is not.

review: How can an update completely make the app non-functional??? Can’t schedule classes with ANY business. I’m also not able to schedule classes directly through a business’s app if that business uses MINDBODY (for example Orange Theory. Can’t even book or cancel through the orange theory app because it uses MINDBODY for booking). Also, all of my scheduled classes have disappeared. What is going on??? Developers need to fix this ASAP. You also need to send a memo to the businesses that use you, because anyone who incurs a fee because they were not able to cancel on time is MINDBODY’s fault.
title: PLEASE FIX THIS CATASTROPHE
developerResponse: {'id': 17015880, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear you're experiencing issues, please reach out to the support team so we can assist you directly, you can reach us at Profile > Settings > Contact Us.", 'modified': '2020-08-01T09:27:12Z'}

review: Love this app. Greatest invention for keeping your fitness and practices going while on the road or at home. Also makes trying new things so easy.  Love the specials too.  My favorite gyms and studios are using it now and it allows them to offer more competitive pricing and more package pricing.
title: Hawaii to NY and everywhere in between

review: MINDBODY is a wonderful invention to helps all of us fitness junkies find cool workout studios. All different types of fitness activities! However, I’m deducting two starts because this application is not the simplest to use. I wish it was more clearer/ neat, showed more detailed Maps of the locations, and gave list of all the studios names of classes & times etc. I do love how they have the instructors bio for you to read. Minor improvements in the last update. So I was just hoping to see more.
title: App
developerResponse: {'id': 8465045, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, we are so glad our app has helped you find workout studios and fitness activities. We are sorry to hear you have  experienced difficulty using our app and appreciate your suggestions. Please stay tuned for future updates that improve our map and class listings.  If you have any further questions or concerns please reach out to us via our in-app chat or send us an email at app@mindbodyonline.com so we may further assist you!', 'modified': '2019-05-01T18:39:03Z'}

review:
Usually I am able to book my classes without too much issue. Infrequent downtime from the app servers.

I absolutely hate that frequently an app update will remove the class detail (# spots available, # spots booked) if you book yourself for the class. After you book you only see “You are signed in”. Every once in a while the developers smile upon me and leave the available/booked counts viewable after I sign in for a class. I wish they would stop taking it away though.
title: Mostly works, not my favorite
developerResponse: {'id': 3884000, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback. We take customer feedback seriously and will look into if we can make a future change that displays the number of spots booked and available regardless of your booked status. If you have any additional questions or feedback please reach out to us in our in-app chat so we can help you out.', 'modified': '2018-06-18T20:49:23Z'}

review: It would be great to get push notifications for changes to classes i.e: if I’m waitlisted and get into the class, rather than notification via email. (Usually my emails don’t get pushed fast enough and I won’t receive emails from 10am until 4pm, etc) Would have missed the class completely had I not randomly checked my email 1 hour before.
title: Push notifications
developerResponse: {'id': 2185403, 'body': 'Hello Tooty! We always love to hear feedback as to how we can make your experience outstanding. Thank you for sharing!', 'modified': '2018-01-02T18:22:04Z'}

review: This app used to be great and now it’s terrible and unreliable. It quits constantly and takes a long time after opening to show the list of booked appointments. Sometimes it doesn’t show them at all. When trying to open individual appointments to look at details, it almost always quits. It’s becoming nearly impossible to use. For an app that so many businesses use and rely on, it’s really unfortunate that the software is so poor. I hope there will be updates to these issues!!
title: Horrible app

review: Even before the age of COVID, I used the app to book and calendar classes in neighborhoods near my own. A convenient way to align classes with my schedule and needs. But, MINDBODY‘S Virtual Classes have been essential in my efforts to stay fit during “lockdown”. The breadth of classes has opened up studios and class types in locations that I may never visit.
title: Godsend While Sheltering
developerResponse: {'id': 15874700, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback, we really appreciate it during this time! ', 'modified': '2020-06-09T11:58:30Z'}

review: I was skeptical about joining at 63 years old, but I love it! There is no judgment and I can do the steps at my own pace. Every class it gets bit easier. The music and lights make it fun as well! The instructors are awesome! I really look forward to my classes as I am finally getting some well needed exercise!!!
title: Love Zumba

review: The newest update has the app freezing up at the “new features” tutorial. When you click skip, nothing happens. When you scroll through each page and finally click done, nothing happens. I can’t access my class to cancel it and will probably be charged for not showing up. Also won’t be able to sign up for any upcoming classes until they fix this. I keep clicking over and over, closing the app and reopening and still the same thing. Don’t bother updating if you want to be able to use the app!
title: Don’t update
developerResponse: {'id': 3204608, 'body': 'We were able to fix this issue so you can now get past the intro screens. Sorry, again for the inconvenience. If you have any additional questions, please reach out to us via our in-app chat.', 'modified': '2018-04-20T16:02:11Z'}

review: This class is the best. Lindsey has incredible energy and always encourages all of her spinners. The class is challenging but her positivity and cheerfulness guides you to the finish line. You can also look forward to a fun playlist and she’s wide open to music recommendations. All in all the best class I’ve ever attended.
title: Spin class
developerResponse: {'id': 16308941, 'body': 'Thanks for your kind words, be sure to rate your class within your History under Profile so the business get to see this too. Thank you.', 'modified': '2020-06-30T10:08:24Z'}

review: When it works it’s great but lately the app has a bug where I can see a studios classes on the desktop version and even in the my schedule section of the app but not when I go to book a class in the app itself. It says no classes found. This happens for multiple studios! Tried to get help for this problem but all support seems to be for the businesses, not the end users. NOT COOL MINDBODY!  You forced me to provide this feedback here, along with a one star review and to uninstall your now worthless app. Fix this bug!!!
title: App doesn’t list any classes for my studios
developerResponse: {'id': 17157258, 'body': "Hi there, please update your app we released a fix after the feedback we received identifying the issue you're referring to. We do apologise for any inconvenience caused! ", 'modified': '2020-08-08T13:07:58Z'}

review:
Overall this is a great app.  Especially when I travel.  Finding yoga studios around the country has been a snap.  

Just 1 little thing, though.  Integrations with other apps don’t stay connected.  My Strava app integration constantly disconnects. I have to go in and connect each time before I sync my activity.
title: Just 1 little thing
developerResponse: {'id': 12929102, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your review. This is something we're aware of and working to fix. Thanks again!", 'modified': '2020-01-15T12:03:39Z'}

review: Attentive, creative , fun .... they have really nailed it - to being as close as possible to being in a live class ....elisabeth + fred..are the originators of corefusion barre.. no one else can come close.... love being in this class!!! mentally & physically...there must be a reason that people all over the world are setting their clocks!👏🙏🙄
title: Corefusionbarre

review:
I have been trying unsuccessfully since February to link my main Orangetheory account with other locations.  I talked to Customer Service but they were only able to link one account.  Multiple phones have not helped and multiple emails have gone unanswered.

Update (6/14): Mindbody was able to fix my issue with booking cross regional classes.
title: Will not link Orangetheory accounts
developerResponse: {'id': 3642894, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing a rating. We apologize that you have not heard back from customer support and want to look into this for you — can you please reach out to us via in our in-app chat and reference this review so we can make sure you get this resolved?', 'modified': '2018-05-29T20:12:03Z'}

review: App and website are trash.  Depending on the merchant you’re trying to book with, the experience is completely different.  Not holding booked classes.  Had to log into website from computer to reserve class, because it wasn’t holding the class from the app.  Seeing two different things in two different places, for the same account.  Ugh. Waste of time and energy.
title: Works great, until you need to use it

review: Before the latest update I liked going into the app to see local business. It was easy to choose from fitness, wellness and beauty and then refine your search based on the specific type of studio or service. After the update, searching for a business is super annoying. I hate the way the explore tab is laid out. Super “clunky”. Tons of wasted space with the top search bar (which is annoying in and of itself). Basically the app is now super frustrating for someone who used to enjoy it before the update.
title: Latest update is not great
developerResponse: {'id': 3463576, 'body': "Thanks for leaving a review. We take our customer's feedback seriously and worked hard to create an update based on previous feedback we received. We're currently working on a future update that will consolidate the top section on the Explore tab!", 'modified': '2018-05-14T18:36:00Z'}

review:
I am a full time member of a mind body affiliate, but there is no way for the practices I book to show up in my calendar. I am busy!

The best the app does is tell you that sometime you are going to go… it’s good about telling you when you cancel. Not so good about making sure you get there.

To me, that seems counter-intuitive of the point. I’m not supposed to prepare my day around this THING I DONT REMEMBER so as to anticipate and become anxious. It should seemlessly integrate into my life, and by doing do so provide me the ability to tell my calendar off.

I’m sure the creators had great intentions, but they’re literally losing the lost. Peeps like me who want the help, but don’t remember they already paid.
title: Failure of calendar integration

review: With the latest version, a new feature “add payment” was added.   I pay my gym monthly and they do not use this feature.   After three separate reloads of the app I’m still unable to move my classes around without it asking for payment of some sort.  This is VERY frustrating as the gym tells me they will not charge but the app won’t let me reschedule my classes without adding a card, which I will not be doing.   Please do whatever u can to fix this issue as it’s becoming very frustrating. 😖
title: Does not let me reschedule without payment
developerResponse: {'id': 10369247, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback, we'll be sending this over to our development team.", 'modified': '2019-08-27T06:56:29Z'}

review: I like the app just fine for what it is supposed to do, but the major issue is that it shows class times in local time, but when you hit Add to Calendar it adds them in your current time zone, not the time zone of the class location. Example: Booking a 7am class in Chicago when you are located in California, adds the class for 7am PST, which means you’ll miss your class by 2 hours. Very poor implementation.
title: Decent app, major flaw
developerResponse: {'id': 5317350, 'body': 'Thanks for your feedback. We will look into this issue — please stay tuned for future updates to the app that will account for time zone differences when booking classes!', 'modified': '2018-10-01T23:19:12Z'}

review:
I love this app and honestly I hate it when gym/yoga businesses don’t use it because it’s so convenient for me.

But.... it would be really nice if there was a connect with friends feature where I can see when and where my friends are going to the gym/Yoga so I can catch up with them without having to ask if they are going everyday...
title: Love the app needs more friend connect

review: Beware if you take virtual classes with a studio in a different time zone because the app will show a single class as being at the same hour for two different time zones (e.g. 11:30 am EST and 11:30 am CST). If you book classes a few days in advance, this makes impossible to manage your calendar via theMindBody app. Unfortunately their app support has no simple way to report the glitch so who knows how long the problem will persist (I have screenshots that demonstrate the issue).
title: Time Zone Glitches Galore

review:
Hi there! 
The staff at MP is truly exceptional! If you are in a situation where you can’t get into your classes they readily respond and answer your questions. 
I’m also very grateful to all the teachers that are teaching in keeping us sane during this isolation period.  
Thanks again for keeping us posted on all the upcoming classes and changes that are occurring from MP!!
Diane La Pierre
title: Awesome staff
developerResponse: {'id': 14838658, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback. Be sure to go into your Profile > History and rate one of the classes there so the studio get's to see this too! ", 'modified': '2020-04-22T12:27:20Z'}

review: I love that I can see different schedules and book classes from one spot.  I can also see what’s left on my passes and that helps keep me on point and accountable for my workouts.  I often use it when I travel as well - it’s a great informational website with many different types of classes - I love it!
title: Keeps me moving
developerResponse: {'id': 13289144, 'body': 'Thank you so much for this review! ', 'modified': '2020-02-04T14:02:03Z'}

review: Easy to use! Also great if there is a cancellation of your class, the teacher knows you are coming and can contact you if need be to save you a trip. It’s also great to pay on the app earlier in the day, so if you’re running into class last minute, you don’t have to stop at the front desk.
title: So convenient

review: I had to edit my previous review because it was total user error. I didn’t realize the data was turned off for this app and that was causing my issues. You can search by location and booking is so easy! But I agree with a review below, I would love for it to sync with Apple health!
title: So easy to use
