developerResponse: {'id': 4656598, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. We're sorry to learn you're having trouble using our app and want to help! Please email us at app@mindbodyonline.com so our team can look into this for you.", 'modified': '2018-08-14T20:36:37Z'}

review:
Thank you for your efforts to make the app more user-friendly. In many ways, l find it far easier and quicker.

(I am still snagged with writing a review of the studio experience and find navigating that a bit cumbersome.)

 lf this were improved and finding where to write the review for my studio, l would be happy.
title: Excellent Improvement on the APP
developerResponse: {'id': 3973113, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback! We're glad you appreciate our newest update in order to make finding and booking classes more accessible and efficient. Please stay tuned for future updates that will improve upon our search functionality to make it even easier to search for studios and classes!", 'modified': '2018-06-25T18:54:05Z'}

review: This is an excellent adult workout for those who want to strengthen and increase stamina.  They pay close attention to your form, and never the same workout.  Small classes are great to be sure you are doing things properly.  They answer your questions almost immediately, and super helpful.
title: AR Fit Adults review
developerResponse: {'id': 19711731, 'body': "Thanks for your feedback, be sure to leave the studio a review under your History so the studio get's to see your encouraging words. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-12-12T12:23:51Z'}

review:
The app keeps canceling the wrong class without any sign resulting in major inconveniences and financial losses.

The app also makes it impossible to track what passes I have, which one I want to use, and how much I used them. I have 2 passes to the same place one with later expiration date than the other one. The app keeps using the newer one before finishing the old one and there is no way to change it.

In general, it takes me forever to find anything in this app.
title: Bugs and lack of UX

review: There are so many things broken with this app, it’s hard to list them. Here’s the worst: calendar sync is broken. Guaranteed you’ll have appointments disappear and reappear, and sometimes you’ll have to set up sync again in the app, two or three times a week. What’s the point if a studio or client can’t trust that their schedule will be accurate and available?
title: This is what happens when there’s only one dominant player

review: I love that it keeps track of the classes I have taken . I can travel out of town and find classes nearby through mind and body. Yes and it will add the class to my history of past classes. Oh and you can book and pay for classes in the app. I really utilize the mind body app in every way.
title: Love tracks my classes
developerResponse: {'id': 11147685, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback, we're glad you're loving the app and utilizing it outside your home town! ", 'modified': '2019-10-09T12:14:59Z'}

review: Best app to book my workout classes with!! Shows me the whole schedule in advance. I won a holiday package for taking 40+ classes in December, the gift is just amazing I’m thankful for the recognition!! Would recommend this app 10/10 to anyone trying to book workout classes etc
title: MINDBODY app
developerResponse: {'id': 13570613, 'body': 'Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!', 'modified': '2020-02-19T01:56:23Z'}

review: I like that I can search the area and find places and workouts I didn’t even knew existed in my area. I do hope that they improve the service by listing options that offer a free class or pass. This way people can try new workouts or classes without the initial investment. I’m not looking for long term free, just the option for a one class pass.
title: Needs free options
developerResponse: {'id': 8465071, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, we are so glad our app has helped you find new places and workouts in your area! It is up to studios to decide whether or not they want to list an intro offer in our app so make sure to keep an eye out for special intro offers listed by certain studios. If you have any further questions or concerns please reach out to us in our in-app chat so we may further assist you!', 'modified': '2019-05-01T18:41:09Z'}

review: The app keeps crashing whenever I click on a studio’s schedule or profile. In other instances, it tells me the schedule is not available. It has also gotten slow. I heavily rely on this app to book all my classes at different studios in one place. Please fix the bugs!
title: Keeps Crashing!
developerResponse: {'id': 6833308, 'body': "We're sorry to hear you're having issues using our app and want to help. Please email us at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can look into this for you.", 'modified': '2019-01-14T22:14:28Z'}

review: This app is fantastic, when it works.  I tend to have a lot of glitches including the one today where it says there were 24 reviews on the class I’m interested in, but when I click on “see all” there are only four reviews. 🙄🤷‍♀️ The navigation can be tricky at times and the updates continually “fix” things that aren’t broken!! I don’t want to re-learn an app after every update.
title: Great When it Works!
developerResponse: {'id': 9813047, 'body': 'Hi! I am glad you like the app, when it works for you! Reviews will only display if a comment is left. So if it says 24 reviews and only shows 4, the others did not leave a comment. We appreciate your feedback.  I will share it with our Development Team. Please reach out to us in chat whenever you have an issue. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner. ', 'modified': '2019-07-23T20:55:51Z'}

review:
I use MindBody business for work and love it! I use MindBody Fitness when I travel. The new search options and interface aren’t as easy to use/quick as before and it hasn’t elevated my search specificity,  yoga still come up when I search Pilates. 
I dread trying to find classes now.
title: I Wish I Didn’t Update
developerResponse: {'id': 3546349, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback. If you go to the Explore tab on the bottom of the screen, then tap the Filters button on the bottom right of that screen, you will have the option to narrow your search to just Pilates. Please reach out to us if you have any additional questions.', 'modified': '2018-05-22T00:01:53Z'}

review: In general, I love this app because it makes it easy to book classes online. However, occasionally when I cancel a class in the future, it cancels for the current day instead. I talked to others at my studio who have also had this issue, so I know it’s not isolated. Would be great to prevent this glitch, if so then I’d give mindbody 5 stars
title: Great idea, execution has a few flaws

review: I get sent in to this loop where I cannot log into my account or even make a new account on this app. I contacted customer service about this because I just want to log into my account on the app, and they sent me a response saying we can’t make changes to a business without contacting the business first and getting their approval. Who said anything about a business? Why is the support response worse than if I just went on chatGPT and asked?
title: Can’t log in - customer support a joke

review: Had been using this app for a long time to book classes at some local companies and explore new options. It worked pretty well but now with the “new” design is completely messed up! Hard to even search the available classes at the companies I use - why make something that worked well no longer user friendly? Too complicated a search protocol to navigate for a non techie who just wants to book an appointment!
title: What were you thinking?
developerResponse: {'id': 3331783, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback. We're sorry to learn that you're having trouble finding the classes you love with our app and want to help! Please reach out to us via our in-app 'Chat with us' feature located on the Profile screen and we'd be happy to assist.", 'modified': '2018-05-02T16:27:33Z'}

review:
Within 60 seconds you can book into your favorite class. With a bit more time, you can explore other interesting classes in your area. 

What could be improved on is for my favorite classes, when I don’t have anymore pass books, it’s a bit too easy to go with a single class pricing instead of buying another class book.
title: Great for booking class on your schedule
developerResponse: {'id': 9356497, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback, we'll ensure this is passed to the right team!", 'modified': '2019-06-26T07:14:32Z'}

review:
MINDBODY not only overcharges for its service to the wellness establishments you love, they’re also horrible at serving their customers.

I’ve been trying to book a class, but not only is it impossible manage the cards I currently have on file with mindbody, it’s also impossible to PAY WITH THEM. I have to enter an entirely new card to pay for my class. It’s ridiculous. 

They’ve essentially monopolized an industry, and then failed to provide adequate service to it.
title: Poor app, poor support

review:
I had a 2 day pass to rock climbing and registered for one. When I check back later to use my 2nd day pass, it was gone and turned out MINDBODY used the 2nd day pass to reserve for the same exact session as my 1st day pass. Used the “contact us” and created a ticket, it states will respond back within 24 hours but it’s been almost 5 days and no response. My 2 day passes has already expired yesterday and was hoping to use it. 

Please respond!
title: Took away my 2 day pass for a 1 day session

review: I hadn’t done yoga since I was in my teens & early 20’s. Now, in my 50’s, here I am doing Gentle Yoga with Quin. She has such a kind & gentle spirit. I believe she is just the person to help me achieve my goals: relaxation, mindfulness of my body and spirit, improved range of motion, strengthening of my muscles, & basic yoga terms/positioning. I really look forward to our sessions❤️
title: Studio Stretch Shreveport

review:
My local Crossfit uses the app to book classes. The app makes it easy to find available classes and book. The app also has a feature that adds the class to your calendar. In addition, in case something comes up and I have to reschedule or cancel, it is very easy. 
Overall great app!
title: Great app!
developerResponse: {'id': 6375066, 'body': "We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. We're glad you use our app to book classes and add to your calendar. We hope you continue using it again in the future as well!", 'modified': '2018-12-13T22:10:08Z'}

review: I love using this app whether to check my schedule or to register for class. If I need to pay for additional classes well I can do it through the app as well. It offers variety of choices and businesses but as of now only use it to access various yoga studios.
title: Easy and convenient
developerResponse: {'id': 2516193, 'body': 'Thank you for the positivity. We will always be here to support and expand your wellness journey!', 'modified': '2018-02-06T23:32:29Z'}

review:
This app is so easy to use and it has a feature that allows you to automatically add your scheduled events to your phone’s calendar. I certainly appreciate the reminders too. 
I love it! ❤️ It’s perfect for those of us, that need the extra help to keep track of their busy schedule!
title: It’s so easy!!
developerResponse: {'id': 18537499, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you so much for your review we really appreciate it! If you need anything feel free to reach out to us at app@mindbodyonline.com Thanks! ', 'modified': '2020-10-17T12:36:54Z'}

review:
What I want this app to do is to search locally for what services are available to me from all the businesses which use the app in a given time slot.

If it has that capacity it’s not easy to figure it out.  What is easy to do is to search for a single service at a specific time at one business.  Why do I need the app for that?  Why would I not just call that business or use their website?

Very disappointing and very annoying.
title: Annoying and difficult to use

review:
This app is so incompatible with the fitness providers I patronize. Whenever I open it to
sign in to classes, it often will it not recognize my membership to certain businesses. Whenever I try to sign up for classes, I’m often redirected to use the app to do so where it becomes incompatible to sign up. Using a browser to sign up is the only practical way for me! 

I don’t understand the disconnect between the website and the app but it is huge and ridiculous.
title: Terrible App

review: I love using the Mind Body app to register for classes. It is also very convenient when I travel and can use it at fitness places in other locations. One improvement I would like to see is the ability to pay on the app in my home gym like I can in other locations.
title: Mind Body is awesome
developerResponse: {'id': 8139139, 'body': 'Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are so glad you love using our app to register for classes at home and while traveling. Please stay tuned for future updates to our app that improve upon current payment capabilities. Thank you!', 'modified': '2019-04-09T19:14:25Z'}

review: I’ve been using this app for years and it never used to have issues. The past couple months/updates have been awful. The app constantly freezes and crashes. In order to do anything, it takes multiple tries. That can have real financial impacts if you’re trying to cancel a class and can’t get past the home screen. The development team said this last update would fix the bugs but it’s still freezing and crashing. These updates need to be tested.
title: Still too buggy
developerResponse: {'id': 9012790, 'body': 'We apologize for the issues you are experiencing with loading times and are working on a fix. Please stay tuned for an update to the app that will address the issues you are currently experiencing!', 'modified': '2019-06-04T19:34:24Z'}

review:
Easy to use, provides all the needed info in a pleasant user interface. When I want to schedule a yoga session, I open the app, click on the class I want at my preferred location, then click to add it to my calendar. 
Couldn’t be easier, whole process takes 30 seconds.
title: Great app
developerResponse: {'id': 3273220, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to share a rating! We're thrilled to learn that you find our app easy to use and can easily schedule your yoga classes in less than 30 seconds. We hope you'll continue to explore different classes and features!", 'modified': '2018-04-26T16:27:12Z'}

review: This app makes it so easy to schedule myself at two of my favorite studios. It’s way easier to check the schedule and book the classes from the app than it is to go to the website of either studio. Definitely worth it to download.
title: So convenient
developerResponse: {'id': 10163824, 'body': "Hello there! Thank you for your feedback, our aims to connect the world to wellness, so to hear this we're so glad you're loving the app!", 'modified': '2019-08-14T09:24:56Z'}

review:
I don’t know how MBO has conned so many businesses into using it. It’s a terrible service that is bug-ridden and labyrinthine. They frequently have issues with crashing that make it impossible to see schedules, which I’m sure costs companies a lot of business, and it makes those companies (wrongly) look incompetent.

Furthermore, if you work somewhere that uses mbo, you’re basically screwed. The desktop platform becomes unusable and you’re stuck using the deeply hit or miss mobile app.

We should all just get rid of mind body.
title: So terrible
developerResponse: {'id': 3094402, 'body': 'Unfortunately, we had a temporary system outage on April 5th that we take very seriously, and we are sorry to hear that you had a negative experience. Full service was restored later that day, but if you are still experiencing issues, please chat with us using our in-app chat feature or at app@mindbodyonline.com.', 'modified': '2018-04-10T22:23:52Z'}

review: The classes and trainers at Pursuit are top notch. The variety in classes keeps it interesting while working all body parts! The trainers from Veronica, Christina and Erik are so knowledgeable and helpful they push you to do your very best! Just when I feel ready to quit they are right there encouraging you to make every minute count!
title: Hiit/Strength classes
developerResponse: {'id': 16548967, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your review. Be sure to rate the class in your History so they get to see this lovely feedback! ', 'modified': '2020-07-11T06:23:19Z'}

review:
Was so excited to be able to sign up for classes at my old studio where I used to live #corona virus. Nope. Deleted it. Use the web.

Update. They sent a message asking me to “reach out”. Clicked on the link. Went to a bunch of articles none of which answered the question. One said there was a filter for virtual classes under classes. Nope. I have always found this App frustrating but now that I am looking for virtual classes in different geographical areas it seems impossible to me
title: Will not allow more than 50 miles away
developerResponse: {'id': 15029248, 'body': "Hi there, the app allows you to search anywhere in the world, the '50 miles' you're referring to is the distance in miles of that area you've selected. Please reach out so we can show you how to search outside your area. Thanks!", 'modified': '2020-05-01T07:23:37Z'}

review: I’ve trying to use this app for my gym for over 7 months.  Rarely am I able to book or reschedule my classes via the app.  My class schedule is rarely available to review.  There’s no where to give feedback although I got an email telling to use the app to give feedback for a quicker response.  If it’s in the app, then the app is not user friendly. The typically it’s states try again later for your business schedule.  Yet it’s available on the web.  It’s a very frustrating app to use.
title: Rarely works properly
developerResponse: {'id': 12593618, 'body': 'Hi there, we have a 24.7 Live Chat team at your disposal under Profile > Settings > Chat with us. We can discuss the issues and get you sorted. Thanks.', 'modified': '2019-12-26T10:36:17Z'}

review: People like this app because it’s easy to find and book last minute deals. But they have even less liability than Groupon or living social. They don’t monitor their offers or businesses in any way, meaning you can be screwed over entirely by a business owner and MINDBODY doesn’t care nor agree to any liability for a refund. This app is great until it’s not. Until someone doesn’t provide what they’ve offered and you’re left paying for something you didn’t get. I wish someone had warned me.
title: Doesn’t protect purchases
developerResponse: {'id': 10480038, 'body': 'Hi there, I am sorry to hear you had an issue. Please chat with us from the app, we can always reach out to the studio on your behalf. There are options available to you. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages – in Settings in the upper right corner. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner. ', 'modified': '2019-09-02T19:57:09Z'}

review: I’ve used the MINDBODY app for years but recently, it crashes more than once when I’m attempting to schedule a class. The app will freeze/crash after I select a studio, after I select a class, while switching from day to day to see the available classes; pretty much any time I switch screens. Sometimes it will work fine but it inevitably crashes while I’m using it and this has been consistently happening for the last month.
title: App Crashes
developerResponse: {'id': 10298094, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your feedback. At your earliest convenience could you drop us a message under Profile > Settings > Chat with us. We can go through some troubleshooting and get to the bottom of your issues. Thanks in advance! ', 'modified': '2019-08-22T10:45:28Z'}

review: Useful to find and book workout classes with nice tech integration of FitBit and other fitness tracking devices. The only downside is there aren’t many businesses outside workout providers and would be nice to more massage, acupuncture and other wellness options.
title: Easy to find and book classes

review: This app is continuously freezing, I have to open and close it multiple times to get it to work.  I am current on the updates, it is very frustrating to use.  I’ve just been using the individual apps of the locations I frequent because this app is so unreliable.  I do not have this issue with any of the other apps I use.  The app does not allow rating of a studio or fitness center, only individual classes, which is a big drawback.
title: Glitchy
developerResponse: {'id': 9902981, 'body': 'Hi there, thank you for your feedback! I am sorry to hear you are having issues with freezing. Please reach out to our support team. We are here to help you in all things app related. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner.', 'modified': '2019-07-29T16:18:37Z'}

review: I use this app sometimes multiple times a day to schedule exercise classes and massages. I find it easy to use and extremely convenient. I also use it when traveling to find classes away from home and their schedules and addresses. I highly recommend this app.
title: MINDBODY connect
developerResponse: {'id': 3745729, 'body': "Thank you for taking the time to share a rating. We're glad you use our app multiple times a day to schedule your exercise classes and wellness services and especially enjoy it for scheduling classes while out of town. We hope you'll continue to use it in the future and explore our new updates and features.", 'modified': '2018-06-06T17:04:45Z'}

review: I have been using this app for a year and have absolutely loved it, until today. I can not find anything I need. NONE of my studios show up on my page. And I can not for the life of me navigate or do anything in the app like I did with ease before the update.
title: If it’s not broken DO NOT try to fix it.
developerResponse: {'id': 3424880, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback. We're sorry you're having trouble finding the studios you love and we want to help! Please reach out to us via our in-app 'Chat with us' feature and we'd be happy to assist.", 'modified': '2018-05-10T17:25:07Z'}

review: All the teachers are so wise and positive.  I have really good energy from the classes that I have taken.  I love the attitude of everyone and find the teachers super encouraging.  I have not been a member for very ing it when my trial runs out I will definitely make this permanent.
title: Love this place

review: This app is ok. I want to love it because so many businesses use it. I wish there was an Apple Pay option . When I want to book multiple classes at the same studio this is difficult. Improving the search feature so it is easier to find a specific studio instead of suggesting what the app thinks I would like.
title: Needs to upgrade

review: Yoga classes in YOGA STATION (Hartsdale) offer the most wonderful experience for beginners and advanced yogis. The teachers are fantastic, the studio is spacious, clean and there are variety of classes at different times. The atmosphere is inviting, not intimidating (even for very beginner like me) and relaxing. Don’t be surprise if the owners Char and Ravi become your best friends right away! Love love love!!!
title: Yoga at Yoga Station
developerResponse: {'id': 9574645, 'body': 'Hi! We are so glad you loved the studio and your class and the studio! Keep going and soon you will be a Yogi too.', 'modified': '2019-07-09T17:26:22Z'}

review: I haven’t had any of the issues others have mentioned. I’ve used this app for at least 5 different places in three different states. When I travel I love to find a yoga studio to visit. This app makes it very easy to do that. I’ve gotten a lot of use out of it and really like it :)
title: Great for traveling
developerResponse: {'id': 2643966, 'body': 'Thanks for letting us help you expand your yoga practice to new studios, even when you are on the go!', 'modified': '2018-02-21T20:51:35Z'}

review:
The calendar syncing function on this app is terrible. It constantly stops syncing so the classes don’t show up, and I have to manually go and turn off calendar sync and turn it back on in the settings to get them to show up, only to have them disappear again a few days later.

On the occasion when they do show up on my calendar, it always creates another blank “New Event” entry for the same time as the class that crashes the calendar app every time I try to delete it.
title: Calendar Sync Terrible
developerResponse: {'id': 6645714, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback. We apologize for the issues you are currently experiencing with calendar syncing and want to help! Please reach out to us in our in-app chat so we can troubleshoot this for you.', 'modified': '2019-01-02T19:27:13Z'}

review: I opened a Mindbody account in order to pay for appointments that I booked through the app.   After a month I then tried to close my account and was informed that this was not possible.  (!) The instructions suggested that I just delete the app from my phone! I wrote to customer service to request that they officially close my account and delete all info and this is what I got in response: “While processing your request it may be necessary for us to coordinate handling of the request with a third party. “
title: BEWARE! Personal Data Mining
developerResponse: {'id': 3817596, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback. When an account is closed out, we need to handle it with the businesses you have booked classes or appointments from, which is why it may take longer for processing. Feel free to reach out at app@mindbodyonline.com if you have any additional questions!', 'modified': '2018-06-13T00:31:43Z'}

review: Gets the job done. Suggested improvements: Would like to view a list of all upcoming classes from all studios in an area. Also see a full daily schedule for each studio (instead of just one class at a time and swiping to view next one).
title: Works well and I love the color scheme
developerResponse: {'id': 2643905, 'body': 'Fantastic suggestions and thank you for sharing your enthusiasm for the app!', 'modified': '2018-02-21T20:38:17Z'}

review:
I had an issue booking classes at my studio and contacted MINDBODY for assistance.

MINDBODY contacted me within 24 hours and resolved the issue.  After resolving, they followed up to ensure I was taken care of a d able to schedule on line via the App.

Incredible Support!!! Thank you!!
title: Amazing support Team!

review: There are some issues with the app like on the Home Screen the search is clashing with the status bar on iOS. The profile page you can’t access the star hand icon or settings because the drawer has a weird header that covers it. There could be some more feature updates as well!
title: This app can use some work

review: I love using the MINDBODY App for scheduling my weekly gym classes!  It’s easy and convenient and they can also add reminders to your calendar. The MINDBODY App is very user friendly...just tap the class you’re interested in taking and you are immediately signed up. I would recommend the MINDBODY App to all my friends and family!
title: MINDBODY App
developerResponse: {'id': 19260370, 'body': 'We really appreciate your feedback and 5 star review thank you so much! ', 'modified': '2020-11-21T14:20:49Z'}

review: I know early morning class is not her most favorite time of day but she always comes to class energetic when most times we are not! She makes the class so fun singing, dancing around and making silly jokes to get us through the burn in our muscles and keep us coming back for more!
title: Kelly, Kelly, Kelly
developerResponse: {'id': 9965739, 'body': 'Hi there! We are so glad you love the class and the instructor! ', 'modified': '2019-08-01T23:41:34Z'}

review: Loved this app for years, discovered great places with it, especially while traveling. I don’t know what’s going on with it now: the last 2-3 updates have been super buggy. App keeps freezing. Can’t handle it’s own idiot unnecessary pop ups after a booking. It’s really annoying and I have to force quit every time I use it just to reload an application or schedule.
title: Location services stuck
developerResponse: {'id': 6324095, 'body': "We're sorry to learn that location services are not working for you and want to help. On your iPhone, if you navigate to Settings and tap 'MINDBODY', you can choose to enable location while using the app. If you have any additional questions about this please reach out to us in our in-app chat.", 'modified': '2018-12-10T17:49:51Z'}

review: It works great but the only things that needs some work on is make it easier to synchronize to my Fitbit and I can change my email address from my old one that I do not check much these days to my new one that I check all the time. Otherwise it works great.
title: It works great but.....

review: So glad I discovered Ohana Moon yoga studio. Gretta, the owner, is an amazing woman. Her and all of her instructors are professional, fun, helpful, and just plain awesome!I recently brought a girlfriend with me, and she immediately joined the studio as well. The studio is clean, well organized, and the boutique has lots of fun clothes. Keep up the good work ladies
title: Tina Rossi
developerResponse: {'id': 18474147, 'body': 'Hi there, be sure to leave the studio a review under History so they get to see this lovely feedback! Thanks', 'modified': '2020-10-14T10:02:50Z'}

review: The website has classes and services sorted into tabs by categories. The app could really benefit from this functionality. Currently, users have to scroll through the whole list of everything that a gym offers with very limited sort and filter options. Such a time consuming process!
title: Needs Work

review:
I love the MINDBODY app because I can go to one place and book multiple gym classes. Makes staying in shape easier for sure.  I wish I could edit the default calendar setting though because it always saves it to the cloud calendar and that’s not actually my default on my devices.

HS
title: Good to great
developerResponse: {'id': 10358957, 'body': 'Hi there, we are glad you love the app. Thanks for the feature request. The option to link to other calendars is an often mentioned request. I will be sure to add you to that feature request. ', 'modified': '2019-08-26T14:32:33Z'}

review: I bought a pass at my local studio (monthly pass) and when I went to book on the mind body app I was only able to book 1 class and then when I went to book another I was asked for a payment even though my pass is monthly unlimited. Contacted my studio and we thought it was because I had two emails so we merged the two. This still didn't help because we are still dealing with problems with booking. Wish this wasn't such a hassle and Mind Body App wasn't so tricky!
title: Can't use pass
developerResponse: {'id': 17967592, 'body': 'Hi there, it could be that the pass activates on the first visit booked after purchase, please reach out to our support team so we can look into this. Thanks!', 'modified': '2020-09-19T13:01:11Z'}

review: I’ve gone for about three months and the trainer just puts me a little bit past my normal and already I’ve lost weight and a belt size and my body tone is better than others notice. I highly recommend this coaching.
title: Great trainer

review: Love mind body cause their used in a lot of workout places. But their app has really got to be improved. After a few swipes through a schedule it literally freezes and I have to shut the thing down. Why is t this fixed already too? It’s been like this since May of 2019 at least. Note to dev team- time to plan a few sprints to fix bugs and get this running properly. End result equals horrible experience.
title: App sticks 90% of the time
developerResponse: {'id': 9761512, 'body': 'Hi there, we are sorry to hear that you are having so many issues with the app freezing.  Please reach out to our support team. We are here to help you in all things app related. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner.', 'modified': '2019-07-20T19:52:41Z'}

review: When this app works, it’s great. Very user friendly, good information and a wide range of businesses. That being said; lately it’s workability is very inconsistent. The app will either say it can’t find any workouts in my area - where there had been hundreds the day before or it won’t load a businesses schedule. I have updated it and refreshed the app without success. So disappointed.
title: No consistency
developerResponse: {'id': 9012646, 'body': 'We apologize for the issues you are experiencing with searching for classes and want to help! Please reach out to us in our in-app chat so we can resolve this for you.', 'modified': '2019-06-04T19:24:29Z'}

review: I’m so glad to see the gym opening back up. It’s a great location now even better than before! I love all the classes that they have great instructors to couldn’t ask for better! Anybody interested this is the place to be you won’t be sorry🤗
title: Amen it’s finally opening September 1♥️
developerResponse: {'id': 10278097, 'body': 'Hi there thank you for your feedback about one of the studios that use our software. Be sure to leave a review on your History so the business gets to see this too! ', 'modified': '2019-08-21T10:52:15Z'}

review:
I just want to see schedules and look at classes but nearly every time, it says something went wrong and to look later. Even after a recent update. I finally got a class scheduled, paid for, and now when I go back, it doesn’t show anything again. 
This app could be great, but it’s incredibly frustrating. I deleted and redownloaded the app... and now I can’t log in because “something went wrong. Try later”. 

This app would be 5 stars if it would JUST WORK.
title: Rarely lets me look at schedules
developerResponse: {'id': 10287604, 'body': 'Hi there, I am sorry to hear you are having so much trouble with the app. We have support available to help you! Please reach out to is in chat. You can find the chat with is option on both the login and the Profile page. On Profile it is in the upper right corner in the gear icon. Please reach out, we would love to help you.', 'modified': '2019-08-22T00:37:16Z'}

review: The app is easy to use and for the one time I had some challenges with syncing my calendar and some confusion about the functions, customer support was quick and very friendly. They really listen to feedback and make you feel appreciated.
title: Great Customer Support
developerResponse: {'id': 9275069, 'body': 'We are so glad to hear you love the app and our support team! We are here for you 24/7!', 'modified': '2019-06-20T23:14:06Z'}

review: Provides a quick and easy way to schedule my Pilates classes. Allows me to see when classes are full (the club website doesn’t show that until you try to sign up). It’s easy to add the class to your personal calendar.
title: Quick and Easy
developerResponse: {'id': 5231255, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback! We're glad you like our app for scheduling your Pilates classes and adding classes to your calendar. We hope you continue using our app in the future!", 'modified': '2018-09-25T22:59:14Z'}

review:
Easy to use I love MINDBODY app I use it when I go out out of town and want to take a yoga class near where I’m
Staying . I love how easy it is to book and also if you need to cancel . No need to talk to anyone . You can also read studio reviews very helpful
title: Love this app

review: I love this new feature in the latest update! I was just thinking that I wish there was a way to see all my local studios on one schedule- and now it’s here! It saves time from flipping from one studio schedule to the next (or remembering the schedule)when planning my week.  Thanks!
title: Calendar with all classes at all favorite studios!
developerResponse: {'id': 3802011, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback! We're thrilled to find that you love the new update and especially enjoy seeing all of your local studios in one place and planning your schedule for the week. We hope you'll continue to explore and utilize our app and the new features.", 'modified': '2018-06-11T17:50:28Z'}

review: Alex is truly dedicated to the science behind total mind, body, and health transformation!  The workouts are tough but offer the most benefits in the least amount of time.  Highly recommend, it is transformational and Alex is such a pleasure to have as a personal coach!  You won’t be disappointed!
title: 5 Stars aren’t enough!
developerResponse: {'id': 13979991, 'body': "Hi thanks for your review, be sure to leave a review under your Profile > History so the studio and staff members can see this as I'm sure they'd appreciate it! Thanks again.", 'modified': '2020-03-11T08:05:31Z'}

review: Logged me out for some reason, telling me my Face ID expired. Don’t remember my password, so I reset. Used the link sent in my email to reset my password on the web. Got a success. Tried to log in on the app and it tells me my password is wrong. So I try to go in as a guest. Tried to look for the place all the different ways (by name, general search by radius) and it says nothing found. Every search resulted in absolutely nothing. Useless. It used to be so good.
title: The app does not work

review:
Since the update, the app keeps logging me out. 
Also, I booked a class at a studio and paid. When I got to the location of the class, there was a note on the door that the studio had closed permanently. Yet, somehow I paid for something that didn’t exist. First, I reached out to the mindbody support and was basically told they couldn’t do anything. So, I had to call my bank to get the money back. There should be some type of verification system in place to prevent this from happening.
title: Has Issues
developerResponse: {'id': 16864401, 'body': "Hi there, any businesses that we're using our platform but have since stopped have processes in place to close down their listings via the app, if this has happened we can only apologise. In terms of the logging out issue, we did receive reports regarding 7.1.0 force logging users out when closing out of the app. Our developers have released a fix for this please update to 7.1.2 however when updating, log out and back in to refresh or it may continue to still happen due to the tokens not refreshing. Thank you for your patience whilst we got this resolved! ", 'modified': '2020-07-25T13:06:54Z'}

review: I love scheduling through the Lightwork app. It’s so convenient to be able to schedule or cancel on the fly. And it’s very convenient to have the option to add my booking to my calendar. I truly have only positive things to say about this app. The developers did a fantastic job!
title: So easy to use!
developerResponse: {'id': 9754717, 'body': 'We are so glad you are loving the app! We kind of like it too!', 'modified': '2019-07-19T21:01:27Z'}

review: I really love the convenience of this app to search and book yoga classes. When I am away, it’s very easy to find classes near me. There is a way to mark my favorites, book classes, and cancel classes. It will also show my schedule. I use it daily.
title: Great app especially if you travel.
developerResponse: {'id': 4637018, 'body': "Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback! We're glad you love the convenience of searching and booking yoga classes near you and while you're away. We hope you continue to schedule classes and explore the new features in our app as well!", 'modified': '2018-08-13T21:00:17Z'}

review: This app makes it very easy to check your schedule, sign up and/or cancel workouts. If I could add anything to this app, I wish when I need to cancel a workout that it would also remove it from my calendar.
title: Mind Body is a great way to schedule workouts
developerResponse: {'id': 3844337, 'body': "We appreciate you taking the time to share a review. We're thrilled you love our app to schedule workouts and check your class schedule. It should remove the class from your calendar when you cancel it. If you're still having problems with this, please reach out via our in-app chat so our team can help you out!", 'modified': '2018-06-14T18:49:39Z'}

review: I like the app bc I go to different studios and this keeps them all in one place. The app seems to freeze up when I’m checking out different days. I hope this bug is fixed. This never used to be a problem before the last update
title: Very helpful app
developerResponse: {'id': 2770153, 'body': "We appreciate the stellar feedback and apologize for the checkout troubles. If you have a moment to give our app support team a holler, visit help.mindbody.io or tap More then Live Chat in the app's menu. Our team can quickly investigate and resolve the intermittent checkout conundrum.", 'modified': '2018-03-07T18:32:58Z'}

review: I know this app has a stranglehold on small businesses and they charge these businesses plenty. As a user I am unimpressed. Today I needed to change my password due to getting hacked. No way to do that on your profile. I looked and looked. Finally figured out that I have LOGOUT first, then when trying to log in again I have select FORGOT PASSWORD (I had not forgotten my password). Only THEN do I get sent a link to reset password. HORRIBLE USER INTERFACE, poor software.
title: Software is terrible

review: Somehow I managed to make two accounts with the same email but different passwords for both the app and online class booking. The accounts aren’t connected and you can’t use the other password to log in on the other platform. I’ve had the studio contact support multiple times which has been no help. I’ve also contacted customer support myself a few times with no help their either. They’re unresponsive to simple questions.
title: Website and App not connected
developerResponse: {'id': 19711680, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear about your experience, this is a simple fix our support team can manage, please reach out to app@mindbodyonline.com and we'll certainly get you sorted. Thanks! ", 'modified': '2020-12-12T12:15:32Z'}

review: I love this app because it has so many different studios to book all in one location. What is not very user friendly is when browsing for classes, if you click into one class to gather more details, when you return back to the list, it takes you all the way back to the top of the list. Really annoying
title: Browsing feature
developerResponse: {'id': 9012610, 'body': 'We apologize for the issues you are experiencing browsing classes and want to help. We will look into this as a future improvement, and in the meantime please reach out to us in our in-app chat if you have any additional feedback!', 'modified': '2019-06-04T19:21:54Z'}

review:
The most recent update makes the app difficult to use. You are not able to see who the teacher is for a class. The studio name is cut off... let’s hope you know the logo. I can imagine that studios with multiple locations would be annoyed by this.

The user interface is not a friendly as it was before the update.
title: Update isn’t user friendly ☹️
developerResponse: {'id': 3361358, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback with us — we are always looking for ways to improve your experience using our app. Please know that we are currently looking for a long-term fix to address studio names being cut off. In the meantime, we hope you continue to explore and benefit from the updates to our app.', 'modified': '2018-05-04T18:41:04Z'}

review: I have gotten to the point where I am just logging into my gym’s website instead of using this app. 80% of the time it tells me there was an error. I’m working with our gym to get a new app since we get charged if we are late and we can’t really rely on an app that doesn’t work when people have to cancel by a certain time.  There are a few other options out there.  Mind body has a good interface, but it’s all about reliability.  I’ll edit this if any of this changes.
title: Unreliable
developerResponse: {'id': 4891727, 'body': "Thanks for sharing your feedback. We're sorry to learn you are getting error messages using our app and want to help. Please reach out to us at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can help you out with this.", 'modified': '2018-08-31T17:17:47Z'}

review: The updated MBO app seems to have been trying to emulate search functions of apps like Classpass. The MBO UX/UI, though is far clunkier and includes some gaps that make it difficult to search for classes - e.g. users can search for businesses OR classes but can’t look for classes within a business search or vice versa. And the settings for search parameters are hard to access and often too broad or too limited.
title: New version has reduced search function
developerResponse: {'id': 4364170, 'body': 'Thanks for sharing your feedback. We just released updates to our app that improve our existing search functionality — we hope you enjoy the changes. Feel free to reach out to our in-app chat if you have any additional questions.', 'modified': '2018-07-23T22:34:21Z'}

review: I had to emailed customer service for several days before anyone could figure out what was going on and why I could not login to the app but could login to the website.  Then, I tried to link my son to my account so I could see his information and once he was linked his information is still not showing up.  This has been such a headache.  I’m not sure it’s even worth trying to use the app anymore.
title: Terrible app

review: I LOVE the MINDBODY app and use it EVERY day. It allows me to look at almost all of the studio schedules (the studios I go to, that is) all in one app which makes deciding which class to take much faster. I also use the app when traveling to find a great workout in the area. Highly recommend!
title: Vital App
developerResponse: {'id': 12201798, 'body': 'Thank you for your feedback and 5 star review! We really appreciate it! ', 'modified': '2019-12-04T08:41:13Z'}

review: I love the functionality of the app, however after reaching out to their customer service team 4 times to get an issue fixed, I am still unable to access my gym membership portal to book session. Each representative has sent me to the exact same FAQ sheet and then fallen off the face of the earth when I follow up with them. Why have an email to reach out to if you simple redirect me to a FAQ and disappear?? So ridiculous
title: Terrible customer service

review: Love the convenience of being able to book from my phone and the schedule widget, but the app itself is buggy and slow. Classes show up and disappear, and you often have to refresh days 2-3 times to get classes to populate. It’s also very difficult to navigate when purchasing class passes.
title: Buggy and slow
developerResponse: {'id': 17157353, 'body': "Thank you for your feedback, we'll be sure to pass this over to the development team. ", 'modified': '2020-08-08T13:20:32Z'}

review: Before this app, the only way to reserve a spot for a class was to telephone in to the gym, which was time consuming and annoying (since everyone was dialing in at the same time)! The app makes it so easy! Love it! Thank you!
title: Do not miss the old days of calling in a reservation!
developerResponse: {'id': 11699065, 'body': 'Thank you very much for your 5-star review!!!', 'modified': '2019-11-06T23:47:24Z'}

review: I love this app! MINDBODY is one of the main platforms used by most yoga/fitness studios so it’s great to be able to set up accounts with the different studios I visit and for them all to sync up into one app. Just make sure you use the same email for each studio you practice at that uses MINDBODY!
title: Great App
developerResponse: {'id': 10401921, 'body': 'Thank you for the kind words! We are so glad you are loving the app, we kind of love it too.', 'modified': '2019-08-28T17:51:54Z'}

review: Since I updated the App, it’s very easy to scroll back and forth between my three favorite training locations to schedule classes. It works seamlessly and makes it so much more likely that I’ll show up to scheduled training and therefore more likely I’ll get results. Thanks!
title: MINDBODY app
developerResponse: {'id': 7156678, 'body': "We're glad you love the app and that it makes showing up to scheduled classes easier! We hope you continue using it in the future as well.", 'modified': '2019-02-04T21:34:18Z'}

review: I used to love this app but for the past couple weeks I have been having so many issues. Certain classes don’t show up at all and then it says I’m booked for classes on different days then I signed up for. In addition the times are all out of order and then when I click into a certain class for one day the app changes the class to a different day/time. So frustrating. I’ve uninstalled multiple times and updated to the most recent edition. Please help!
title: Used to love
developerResponse: {'id': 8765097, 'body': 'We apologize for the issues you are experiencing using our app and are working on a fix. Please stay tuned for an update to the app that will address the issues you are currently experiencing!', 'modified': '2019-05-20T21:09:46Z'}

review: It’s super easy to navigate through and whenever I book classes they sync up with my phone calendar so that it reminds me I have the class, etc. super great!:) no glitches or any problems so far and I’ve been using for about a month now
title: Love it!
developerResponse: {'id': 10319873, 'body': "Hello Hailey, thank you so much for the feedback! We're glad you're getting the most out of the app especially the calendar feature!", 'modified': '2019-08-23T12:39:28Z'}

review: In the last two months MINDBODY has had several issues with the group studios I use.  Every time I have tried to cancel a class it will cancel wrong day, has told me I was off the waitlist when in fact I was not, several loading errors.  I really hope they can fix all this soon considering how expensive this app is to use for the studio owners
title: Booking errors

review: The app connects me to my favorite studios and helps me try new ones easily. The app is always being improved and MINDBODY is a great platform for businesses to run through. The support team is one of a kind and makes sure you are taken care of! They are the best.
title: FANTASTIC !!! Can’t live without!
developerResponse: {'id': 2405253, 'body': 'Thank you for sharing your rad feedback! We do our best to continuously evolve the app and find new ways to support everyone who is a part of the MINDBODY experience.', 'modified': '2018-01-25T18:30:59Z'}

review:
Stopped doing yoga for 6 months - year and now starting again. 

I used to love MINDBODY to keep track of what classes I did, teachers I had, etc. Now it won’t show me past history at all other than to say I have done whatever number of classes. But it won’t even let me click on my classes to show me any info on the class at all. Also searching for studios is next to impossible now and brings up hair salons before it does studios in the area. 

TERRIBLE App. What happened here?
title: What happened
developerResponse: {'id': 6681424, 'body': "We're sorry to learn you're having trouble viewing your class history and want to help! Please reach out to us at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can further assist you.", 'modified': '2019-01-04T22:24:56Z'}

review:
I just started doing 60 minutes Hot Yoga in Granite Bay, in the morning not knowing what I was getting myself into. 😳
After the first week of classes things became easier.  
The instructors are very professional and understanding on the new students.  I want to thank all the staff. 
Great place for Yoga
title: Getting in shape

review: I have become so accustomed to using the MINDBODY app to help me with all aspects of what studio and when and with what instructor and class style to make my practice of Yoga. I encourage studios to feed the beast accurately and as early as possible when their are changes of instructor or class style.
title: Good info in - Good info out
developerResponse: {'id': 9288501, 'body': 'Glad to hear you are accustomed to using the App! We will continue to give you the best experience we can! 💙', 'modified': '2019-06-21T14:31:30Z'}

review: The idea of this app is 5 stars. The app itself when it’s working is 5 stars. However I have to rate it two stars because it works properly one day of the entire month. I can have full service, full WiFi, I can be on my desk too and this app still refuses to load my schedule or class list no matter the time day or night. Mindbody, I want to love you, but until you fix all of your app issues, I can’t.
title: SLOW
developerResponse: {'id': 10059067, 'body': 'We are sorry you are having trouble with the app and thank you for the detailed feedback. We suggest updating your app to the latest version to resolve any performance issues.\r If you need further help, please visit help.mindbody.io and choose the live chat option located on the bottom right-hand corner of the page where our amazing 24/7 Live Chat team can be reached.', 'modified': '2019-08-07T19:03:27Z'}

review: It’s my third week here and I can already see the difference from my first week. Ralph really pushes you to do better and at the end of each workout you come out feeling great about yourself. Definitely recommend trying.
title: Great Workouts!
developerResponse: {'id': 21240366, 'body': 'Thanks for your review, so glad to hear about your positive experience with a studio, be sure to leave them a review under History so they get to see this.', 'modified': '2021-02-23T14:02:29Z'}

review:
I travel quite a bit for work and this app not only helps me daily to schedule my OM
base classes but also to find and book classes when I am out of town. Love this app!

developerResponse: {'id': 14237123, 'body': 'Amazing! Thanks for the review, great to see you use it on the go!', 'modified': '2020-03-25T11:14:21Z'}

review: If you search for a specific studio, it does NOT show up in the search results. It just shows all of the studios that are closest to your location. COMPLETELY USELESS and a HUGE headache!!! Why can’t you just search for a studio by the name?! It drives me insane, terrible design, frustrating app, genuinely hate it. If I could give 0 stars I would. I hate that so many studios are forced to use this app but their clients can’t even find their studio on the freaking app. Makes zero sense!!!

review:
This app is an awesome way to find and experiment with virtual fitness classes during COVID.

However, ever since the last update I’m unable to successfully register for a class. I am prompted to sign a waiver, I click ok, and I’m taken back to the previous page. I get stuck in this loop and am unable to successfully book anything.

developerResponse: {'id': 17967544, 'body': "Hi there, this issue was resolved 48 hours after it was raised, if you reach out to the app support team should you have any issues, we'll look into this. Thank you.", 'modified': '2020-09-19T12:55:39Z'}

review: I’ve been using this app for over a year and haven’t had any issues up until now. It’s no longer letting me log in. And when I was able to be logged in, my new passes never showed up nor could I find my normal yoga studio (who uses MINDBODY on a daily basis) to sign up for a morning class. It won’t even give allow me to reset a password. This app needs an update and fast.
title: Haven’t had any issues until now
developerResponse: {'id': 14707865, 'body': "Hi there, sorry to hear this, this doesn't sound right at all. Please reach out to us about this at app@mindbodyonline.com or tap 'Chat with us' on the login screen and we'll take a look into this for you. Thank you", 'modified': '2020-04-16T12:20:27Z'}

review: I like the app and use it a lot...it has been helpful to getting back in the habit of regular exercise.  Minor request...would it be possible to book more than one thing at a time.   For example, I want to book a spa treatment for me and a friend or when I travel I want to book a yoga class and a mat rental.  Can I do that?
title: Good app
developerResponse: {'id': 12505941, 'body': "Hi there, to book on behalf of a friend is something that won't be available until next year but it is in the works. Thank you for your lovely feedback! ", 'modified': '2019-12-20T09:53:24Z'}

review: It let's you know where classes are in your area. It always gives you intro deals and some of them are FREE. It comes with a reminder calendar. The booking charges no services fees and its super fast.I use this app avidly and it keeps me VERY consistent with my new hobbies: yoga & pole.
title: Well Recommended
developerResponse: {'id': 10163861, 'body': "Hi there, thank you for your feedback, we're so happy to see you're using some of the features the app has to offer! ", 'modified': '2019-08-14T09:27:38Z'}

review: It’s nice to have a single interface for various clubs. I do yoga at one spot, HIIT at another spot, and when I travel it is whatever is nearby, so could be anything. This app is intuitive and many small studios use it which makes my life easier.
title: Does the job

review: Great app when it works which is almost never...When you open it, takes forever to load up the home screen, and if you want to sign up for classes it takes forever to load the schedule and then it will just crash. Takes me several tries to sign up for a class at a studio that is saved as my favorite..forget about trying to search for a new place, the app just crashes...it used to be much better

review:
I’ve been using this app for close to five years. I’ve never had any real issues with it, I think the app interface is a lot more successful than the desktop interface.

review: The MindBody app makes it easy to find and book classes, and discover new wellness business in my area. When I had purchased a yoga class pass, it was very easy to track how many uses I had remaining.

review: I like this app because I’m able to track different studio schedules & make beauty appointments but lately even that function hasn’t been great. review: Mind and body is the worst software to use. They will not honor anything they say and they will take your money and lie to you and not try to help you in any way. review: I really love how it integrates with Class Pass and onto my calendar. I love to look around in new areas and see what’s out there. It keeps me on track with classes and I can see up to date info when subs are added to the classes.

review: I’ve used this app to book classes for years. Yes, it has its hiccups but overall it did the job. However, the new user interface has way too many clicks, it’s aggravating. When I book a class or get on the waitlist I have to click back four times to the home page to see what number I am. Ridiculous. They should keep the bottom legend bar permanent so I can easily navigate and find what I need.

review:
I've been using for a year with little problems but now the app won't even open all the way before shutting itself down. I've deleted it and still. Help!

review: Love this app for booking classes. And, if something comes up, it allows you to unbook. It also will prompt you to rate the class just after, which is nice to send feedback to the instructor.

review:

Mind body does not offer support to me.  I was told to call the business which I did.  The business said all looked good on their end.  I have deleted and reset the app, made sure my CHROME 
is updated but nothing seems to help.

review: I don’t know why others said this app was not user friendly. I can easily find clubs/locations I am looking for, it saves my favorites for easy reference later and booking couldn’t be easier. I love using this app.
title: Great, user friendly app

review: This app rarely lets me sign in. After I sign it, it gets stuck on an orange screen and never loads. After I finally got signed in, it took multiple times to successfully add my card. I spent at least 20 minutes trying to buy a gym package and after the transaction was complete, it logged me out and once again I cannot log back in. I will not be using the app, only the website. Overall terrible.
title: Terrible App!

review:
This app had been great, the calendar syncing feature made my life easier…until the syncing feature went wacky! Every time I open the app it deletes all the workouts synced to my phone and then will randomly sync them back up.
Please fix this bug or remove the calendar syncing feature, it is a major headache!!!
title: Was great, then calendar syncing went wacky

review: Really love this application and the way it works.  You find your provider, select the technician if applicable, and you find a time slot they are open. Big you have to change, it is no big deal to cancel and remake, plus it will put it on your calendar too.  Great thing gor busy people.

review: I live in 2 different states and have multiple gym memberships. Mind and body makes it really easy to view and book classes. I like that I can list my favorites and go right to the schedule on my phone and buy/book classes. Easy breezy!

review: It’s very convenient to have all your classes or lessons in one app, even combining multiple studios to show your schedule. It’s great that you can just check on the time of a class or appointment anytime, rather than having to call the studio.

review: This app allows me to easily book Orangetheory Fitness workouts at my home studio as well as during my travels. I also love that I can book yoga sessions and the payment processes without extra fees or any delay. Great app that I highly recommend.

review: it doesn't work. it used to work really well (despite the duplications but at least they went into my calendar!) Come on guys. This app would be fantastic if it was just reliable. review:
It's not as simple to use as it once was, but it's great to be able to sign up for different studio's classes. Useful for finding yoga, rock climbing, or pole dancing classes because I have many interests and need to keep fit.

Side note: would love to see something like this for art and crafting classes.

review: It’s easy and accurate both for my home studio and when I travel.  It lets me double check to make sure my fav teacher is still teaching before I get in my car.  I also love that I can view my history!

developerResponse: {'id': 2546475, 'body': 'We are so pumped you are enjoying the app! Thanks for sharing what features you love about the app so we can continue to make it more awesome!', 'modified': '2018-02-10T00:57:33Z'}

review:
Overall a great app that is easy to use.  I have been using it for the past couple of years on my iPhone 6 to schedule my exercise sessions at my local gym.  

Only complaint is that it is a pain to use with my recently purchased iPad because the app’s screens do not rotate to landscape format.

review: The latest update changed the UI, which is fine even though it’s now more complicated to navigate. However, it has also become  super laggy, swiping between days on the schedule takes longer and doesn’t always update! I have an iPhone X so I know it isn’t my phone being too old.

review: This app is amazing. I go to a gym that uses this app and it works perfect. It’s very self explanatory, and perfect for maybe a elder person who needs to use the app. amazing, never had a problem with it! 10/10.
userName: rather not say who wrote this.

review: Lauren guides you through the complexities of the class with encouragement and praise. She has so much energy that transmits to you and by the time you know it, you complete the class. High recommendations for this class and any class Lauren teaches.

review:
I have to deal with this app to book some classes and I spent my entire evening trying to deal with it. On the website my password doesn’t work or my user is not found even though I use them to sign into the app. 
The app then crashes every time after I put all the credit card info. I just don’t understand how such big company in 2022 can be so bad!
title: Crashy app and inconsistent user accounts with the websites.

review:
App was great. What on earth did you do with the latest update? Can’t sign up for any classes, it just says “There was a problem finding a schedule for this business.”

Edit: developer responded & app is behaving again
title: Schedules gone, what happened??
developerResponse: {'id': 17157189, 'body': "Hi, we've released a fix for this please uninstall and reinstall the app from your device please, thank you for your feedback!", 'modified': '2020-08-08T12:58:23Z'}

review: This app makes it easy to find the best class for whatever you are looking for! With one click you can book the class so no worrying that the class will be full when you get there!
title: Best for convenience

review: I am writing this to express my frustration on the app. The business operates in the basis of tricking customers. The policy and terms always change without notification. They used to let people cancel calss any time before class starts without loosing any credits. Now all of sudden, you lose credit if you cancel classes within two hours starts. As a long time user of mindbody, I never receive any email of this changes, this is totally a fraud!!
title: Be aware of use it
developerResponse: {'id': 11393393, 'body': "Hi there, we're sorry to hear about your experience. This is something you would need to take up with the business directly as MINDBODY have no input as to what the business sets their cancellation windows up as. If you tap Profile > Settings Gear > Chat with us you'll be connected to a Live Chat representative from MINDBODY who can help you connect with the business directly to express this. Thanks!", 'modified': '2019-10-22T10:21:03Z'}

review: Using the MINDBODY app for scheduling classes at TYE makes it an even easier transition from the idea of going to class, to taking class, and having a great experience whatever yoga (or related) class a person chooses.  Excellent teachers, excellent class choices, and since yoga is designed for every body it is a perfect choice!  Thanks TYE.
title: TYE (The Yoga Experience)
developerResponse: {'id': 9574926, 'body': 'Hi there, we are so glad you love the app and your classes! We are here for you anytime you have an issue or question.  You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages. The website is https://help.mindbody.io/ the chat icon is in the lower right corner.', 'modified': '2019-07-09T18:02:40Z'}

review: Very convenient and easy to use app that integrates all of my mind-body classes, events, payments and gifts into a convenient schedule with reminder notifications. There’s also an option to add classes I’ve booked to my iPhone calendar. Excellent app!

review: There’s something wrong with the new update. You can’t get past the introduction screen. When you hit skip or done nothing happens. You can’t go on to the actual app. Hope this gets fixed soon.

developerResponse: {'id': 3246067, 'body': 'We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. We’re sorry for the inconvenience regarding the intro screens. We’re aware this is an issue for a small percentage of people still and are working to fix it right away. In the meantime, we recommend uninstalling and reinstalling the app, which should resolve the problem while we work on a permanent fix.', 'modified': '2018-04-24T17:53:14Z'}

review: This app is easy to use and convenient.  I like being able to see what classes are offered and being able to register for the class.

review: On numerous occasions I’ve attempted to sign up for classes through an org’s mindbody portal and for some reason my credentials are not recognized. First time I had this issue, the org recognized it was an issue and Insee it has not been addressed hence this review. Credentials for mindbody app should work for mindbody app regardless of org portal. That simple. Please move this ticket to the front of the queue and stop ignoring the issue. Businesses are losing potential clients.
title: MindBody and business enterprise sync up

review: Love Yoga Center is the most special group of yogis I have ever met! review: In the new update, the bookings show on the main page schedule but don’t say whether you are in the class or waitlisted. This is a huge pain. review: I don’t know what happened to this app.  I haven’t used it in awhile and always remembered it being so useful. Now you can’t filter your search (other than by “time of day”) and the categories are all kinds of messed up - no yoga classes under “fitness”, but I did find a few under “massage”.   It’s all over the place and not at all user friendly anymore.  Very sad I had to delete it.

review: Worst experience I have ever had with any app just trying to make an account—never did successfully get an account.  All I get is ‘something went wrong’ message.   Same result whether trying to set up with email or Apple ID or google.  Evidently systemic problems with this app.  Unfortunately this causes damage to businesses that pay for the ‘service’.

review:
Sending issues with the app to the support doesn't help, contacting them in different methods doesn't help. They don't care that their app isn't working.

Update to answer to their response: YES, It is the case. I've emailed that email address multiple times and haven't heard back, so please stop lying  :) IMAGINE being so bad at customer service that instead of emailing back to a customer you just call them a liar on the app store

review: I’m just loving my class with all of The Coaches. It’s like I have so many Personal Trainers. They encouraged me and they take their time to show me the things that I don’t know. Yes I’m 63, Check out the new Me. They made Me Over.

review: I was hoping this was going to be a non-partisan app but it’s pushing a socialist agenda through it’s “uplifting” memos.  It’s aggravating that they want me to be like Michelle Obama but I flossed over that and continued to look through the app.   Then I did more online research (you’ll have to go deep) and found out more about the creators from Duke.  It’s unfortunate that we have to be wary of these agendas.  I’m back to searching for something a little more “boring” where I’m not a social engineering pawn.
title: Social Engineering
developerResponse: {'id': 10990119, 'body': "MINDBODY pride itself on equality, diversity and inclusion and we reinforce that within the company and our services. We're sorry if you feel there is a socialist agenda and we certainly do take on and appreciate your feedback.", 'modified': '2019-10-01T06:36:58Z'}

review: I contacted Phil through there chat and tried to explain that class dates weren’t showing up on the app or the website.  He finally got them up on the app but kept directing to a link for the schedule. Their app works some times but their website is the real problem as you can’t search for classes on it.  Avoid this app and company at all costs.  Thanks Phil for wasting an hour I’ll never get back.

review:
I don’t know how it’s possible that this app gets such high reviews. I’ve had it for approximately 3 years now. It should be renamed “whoops! Something went wrong” which it says often. Especially, when you’re trying to book a time slot. My passes are sometimes there, sometimes not and at times partially there. I wish my gym would find another app to use. 
ONE STAR

review: In the latest update, the app takes 30 seconds to retrieve and display a single yoga studio’s schedule, as it scans databases about nail salons, massages, hair appointment, trainers, dance lessons, and who know what else. review: App and online accounts aren’t linked to each other so you have info on the app and online and have to edit each place separately and they don’t stay synced. Plus you can’t ever delete your account, ever! You can only delete the app from your phone. They defer all billing issues back to the individual business owner and refuse to help in any way even though all payments are processed through their app.
title: Unhelpful Customer Service
developerResponse: {'id': 2254219, 'body': 'Hello Elizabeth and thank you for sharing your experience with us. Our purpose is to do all that we can to connect you to your favorite businesses in one place with the MINDBODY App and we apologize for the frustration. This connection is made with your email that syncs your profiles that you have with each business to the app. You do need to individually update your email if changed in order for the sync to remain. Completely deleting your account is not part of app functionality, but you always have the ability to remove information under the My Info section of the app. We are working on ways to improve this process thanks to feedback like yours. Keep in mind that we do as much as we can to help in all situations. However, because we are a facilitator for businesses we can not make decisions for the business. We do all that we can to be an advocate for your well being and would love another opportunity to show you just that! Chat back within the app to our Support Team or email us back at app@mindbodyonline.com so we can reconnect.', 'modified': '2018-01-09T20:34:05Z'}

review:
Cons:

1 Does not have Apple Pay. Even New Jersey transit has Apple Pay.

2 Map filter does not work. Always show me all the available facilities, gym, beauty, hair salons, when I just want to narrow down to workouts. 

3 Does not have a good UX flow. When you get into class schedule. Trying to book a class it does not show you all the possible prices available. And many time I have to go back the forth.

Pros:

It is nice to shop around and see all the available option and have the flexibility to experience different workouts.

review:
Each week I waste my time with this app. 

One is supposed to use this app for signing up for classes and appointments at my gym, the Olympic Athletic Club in Seattle, WA.

Each week the gym releases lap swim times that one must reserve in order to swim at a given time the next week. This app does not work for this purpose, always giving an “oops, something went wrong” message when trying to reserve a time. 

I login to the gym website and make reservations without any issue. Each week I give the app a try and it never works. I will no longer waste my time.

developerResponse: {'id': 19105493, 'body': "Hi there, if you've got a membership and it's charging you you're booking outside the current pass dates you've got, there's ways you can book unpaid and then let it reconcile so please reach out to us so we can help with that and in terms of booking your cards stored and when booking a class it prompts you with the class time, payment method and then you have to select BOOK & BUY so be mindful when going through your bookings. review:
BEWARE! 

1. Paid Class-passes can disappear!
I paid a lot of money for the 10 class pass. All is good to go until you don’t use some of them and they disappear after 3 months. 

2. I spoke with my fitness studio and they acknowledged that the pass can disappear due to Mind Body.

3. After that my fitness studio was able to retroact the passes that disappeared.

4. I went on thinking ok maybe an isolated incident. Nope, it happened again so I’m writing this review!
title: BEWARE!
developerResponse: {'id': 9367797, 'body': 'Hi! I am so sorry you are having issues with missing passes. Please reach out to us in our 24/7 Chat Support, we are always happy to help you. You can find the chat feature in the app on the login and profile pages.', 'modified': '2019-06-26T17:15:23Z'}

There is an "Edit" option located on the top right corner of the My Info page in the app. From there you can edit your personal info. Also, signing up from scratch is possible if you are logging in for the first time with an email you have never used in the app. Your email is how your passes and visits are stored in the app. So, if the app allowed the use of the same email across multiple accounts it would cause a bit of trouble when trying to use your passes. We apologize for the experience and we hope that you reach out to your in-app support team located under the More menu or at help.mindbody.io. We know they can turn your app experience from a zero up to 100 as quickly as possible.', 'modified': '2018-03-07T20:05:07Z'}
